Showed his true Humility
Likes our Humility
Recognizes my talent
Slothful Ruler
the Lisp and Lame
Any ward
Cannot usurp this title before §Y$DATE$§!
Attractive
Kerzhenetsian
Cheremisan
Kerzhenets
Cheremisa
Breaking Feudal Obligations
Expose the assassins employer!
will be exposed as an employer of assassins.
translation: 刺客雇主的身份被揭发。

original: Not only did our assassin get discovered, he also managed to implicate that we were behind it.  Now [From.GetBestName] is showing proofs to everyone in the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] that we have broken our feudal contract with a vassal.
translation: 我们的刺客不仅被发现了，还供出了我们是幕后主使。如今[From.GetBestName]正在向[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]的每一个人展示我们违背对封臣的封建义务的证据。

original: This is bad news...
Appearing Martial
Faking Stewardship
Appearing Diplomatic
Faking Learning
I am not the most martial of rulers and sometimes it appears as if I am almost incompetent when it comes to behaving like a knight. Luckily, I know how to manipulate people...
translation: 我并不是一个很称职的统帅，有时甚至连身为一个称职的骑士应有表现都拿不出来。幸运的是，我知道如何操纵人心……

original: Talk the talk and Talk the talk..
translation: 也就是随口一说，随口一说……

original: Let [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName] get the blame.
I simply can not keep up with handling the day to day business of my demesne. I rely on others, but manipulate them to believe that I am doing the harder things.
translation: 我已经忍受不了日复一日的处理领地的政务了。我可以依赖别人去处理公务，同时得让他们相信我是在忙更棘手的要务。

original: Talk the talk and Talk the talk..
translation: 也就是随口一说，随口一说……

original: Let [Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName] get the hard work.
Sometimes the niceties of diplomacy pass me by and puts me in awkward positions. However, by careful manipulation of my court, I've managed to let my courtiers take the blame when things go bad.
translation: 有时候我在外交上的疏忽使我处在尴尬的境地.。不过，只要控制一下舆论，我可以让我的廷臣来代我承担指责。

original: They serve me after all..
translation: 他们毕竟是我的得力助手……

original: Let [Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName] get the blame.
I am not a bookish person and if it weren't for some careful comments in some discussions this would become obvious to my court.
translation: 我不是一个博学的人，如果在一些学识讨论中我不能谨慎地做出评价，全宫廷很快就会知道我的才识浅薄。

original: Talk the talk and Talk the talk..
translation: 也就是随口一说，随口一说……

original: [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName] is not happy with it.
translation: [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName]肯定不会对此事感到高兴的。

original: It is sad that [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] is employing [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName] as [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] marshal. I am more competent and would be a better marshal!
translation: [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]任命[Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName]作为[Root.Liege.GetHerHis]军事总管真是让我伤心。我明明更能胜任军事总管！

original: I will petition my liege!
will listen to our petition and hopefully make a wise choice
translation: 会听取我们的申诉，希望他做出明智的决定

original: [From.GetBestName] claims that [From.GetSheHe] would be a better marshal than [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName], and petitions that [From.GetSheHe] should be given the title of Marshal of the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName].
translation: [From.GetBestName]声称[From.GetSheHe]比[Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName]更适合担任军事总管，并且认为[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]应当把军事总管的职位授予给[From.GetSheHe]。

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] is now my new Marshal
translation: 现在[From.GetSheHeCap]就是我的新军事总管了

original: Give [Root.job_marshal.GetFirstName] a chance!
will hear of our patience.
I rule in the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]!
My liege [From.GetBestName] is not entirely happy with our performance as Marshal of the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName], and is considering our replacement..
translation: 我的领主[From.GetBestName]并不是很满意我作为 [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]的军事总管的表现，并且正在考虑撤换我……

original: I must prove myself!
What can I do?
Enough time has passed, I deserve to become Marshal of the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName], and [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] will make me it!
translation: 时间已经过的够久了，我理当成为[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]的军事总管，[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]会授予我这个职位的！

original: I await [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] reply eagerly.
will listen to our petition and hopefully make a wise choice
translation: 会听取我们的申诉，希望他做出明智的决定

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] is now my new Marshal
translation: 现在[From.GetSheHeCap]就是我的新军事总管了

original: I rule in the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]!

My dear and trustworthy [This.GetBestName].
I hereby grant you the title as Marshal of the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName].

[From.GetBestName]
translation:
我亲爱的和值得信赖的[This.GetBestName]。
我在此赐予你[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]的军事总管职位。

[From.GetBestName]

original: Its what I deserve..
It is sad that [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] is employing [Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName] as [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] Spymaster. I am more competent and would be a better Spymaster!
translation: [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]任命[Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName]作为[Root.Liege.GetHerHis]间谍总管真是让我伤心。我明明更能胜任间谍总管！

[From.GetBestName]
translation:
我亲爱的和值得信赖的[This.GetBestName]。
我在此赐予你[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]的[Root.GetChancellorName]职位。

[From.GetBestName]

original: Its what I deserve..
Pride comes before a fall...
I do not need [From.GetHerHis] advice anyway.
I know I am not the best warrior in the realm, but I so wish I was. There are men who appear to be better than me, and I wish I was like them!
translation: 我知道我不是国内最好的战士，但是非常期望能到达那个高度。还有人比我更优秀，我希望我和他们一样！

original: Insult one of them.
Befriend one of them.
Attempt to emulate them.
Those that talk too sweetly at court are great at diplomacy. I begrudge them their ability, and I covet it for myself.
translation: 所谓杰出的交际能力就是在尔虞我诈的宫廷中能面带微笑的讲着甜言蜜语。我很羡慕那些人的能力，真希望自己也有这种能力。

original: Insult one of them.
Befriend one of them.
Attempt to emulate them.
I covet the stewardship ability of some of the people at court. I deserve to be better at managing my economy.
translation: 我希望能有宫廷中某些人那样的管理能力。我想能更好的管理我的财产。

original: Insult one of them.
Befriend one of them.
Attempt to emulate them.
There are so many great manipulators in the court, and I almost admire their skills if it weren't for the fact that I wish I had what they have.
translation: 宫廷中有许多杰出的谋划者，我对于他们的智谋是又羡又妒。

original: Insult one of them.
Befriend one of them.
Attempt to emulate them.
There are people in the court that are so dedicated to learning. I wish I was more like them, and it vexes me that I am not.
translation: 宫廷内的有些人非常善于学习。我真希望能和他们一样，和他们的巨大差距让我非常苦恼。

original: Insult one of them.
Befriend one of them.
Attempt to emulate them.
I am still childless, and there are women at court with children who are younger than me. I should be the one with a young and healthy son in my arms.
translation: 我至今膝下无子，而宫廷内有不少比我年轻的女士都已经有了孩子。我多希望自己能成为那些怀抱着幼小但健康的孩子的女士们中的一员。

original: Tell one of them how fat she is!
translation: 告诉其中一位女士她有多肥！

original: Befriend one of them
Try to look more attractive to my man
translation: 试着打扮得让我的男人觉得我更有魅力

original: One of the priests seems to have noticed that I fell asleep during his sermons this Sunday. I simply can't understand why slothfulness is not considered to be a virtue..
translation: 礼拜日的时候我在牧师的布道中睡着了，而不幸的是我的睡相还被一位牧师给发现了。其实我就是想不通为什么懒惰不能看成是一种美德呢……

original: I don't think [From.Religion.GetRandomGodName] minds...
[This.GetTitledFirstName] is upset
I was greatly upset when the slothful [From.GetTitledFirstName] fell asleep during my sermon!
translation: 当我发现[From.GetTitledFirstName]在我布道时睡着了，我感到极度气恼！

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] will burn in everlasting hellfire...
will hear my scolding!
It seems that [From.GetTitledFirstName] is upset about me falling asleep during [From.GetHerHis] sermon. Now [From.GetSheHe] is giving me a long lecture about dedication to the Church.
translation: 似乎[From.GetTitledFirstName]因为我在[From.GetHerHis]布道中睡着了而感到很愤怒。现在[From.GetSheHe]正在长篇大论地教导我要有向教会奉献的精神。

original: Ignore [From.GetHerHim]....
Make an effort
I don't even have time for church.
There is just so many sinners at court. I am just too honest a person to keep quiet when I see someone with a vice.
translation: 宫廷内有太多罪恶的人了。我的诚实让我不能在面对这些恶习时保持沉默。

original: Speak my mind!
Keep quiet!
is utterly embarrassed.
[From.GetBestName] has utterly embarrassed me in front of the entire court. [From.GetSheHeCap] is claiming that I am sinful and full of vice.
translation: [From.GetBestName]当众指证我的懒惰和不道德。[From.GetSheHeCap]让我在整个宫廷面前出丑。

original: I don't like [From.GetHerHim] anymore..
I am torn between my honesty and my ability to intrigue. It is stressful to attempt to be both, and I simply do not know how I should behave at times.
translation: 我徘徊于自己施展计谋的能力和性格中的诚实之间。想要两全其美实在是太过困难，许多时候我完全不知该如何是好。

original: I should be more of a diplomat.
translation: 我还是应该用更加光明正大的方式来处理问题。

original: Honesty be damned!
I know when someone is a good ruler, and my liege, [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] is a [Root.Liege.GetManWoman] with virtues. [Root.Liege.GetSheHeCap] deserves praise and respect.
translation: 我知道如何去评判一个统治者，而我的领主，[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]是一位真正德行高尚的[Root.Liege.GetManWoman]。[Root.Liege.GetSheHeCap]理应得到尊重和赞美。

original: Praise [Root.Liege.GetHerHim] publicly!
will learn of our speech.
Send a private letter to [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName].
will read our letter...
My faithful vassal, [From.GetBestName] is rather honest, and have publicly spoken about my virtues. This has radicalized my vassals, where some agree and some do not.
translation: 我忠实的封臣，[From.GetBestName]在公开演讲中赞美了我的美德。这在我的封臣中产生了激烈的讨论，有人同意，有人则不以为然。

original: Oh well..
My dear [This.GetTitle], I wanted to thank you for your virtuous rule. You are an inspiration to me.\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 我敬爱的[This.GetTitle]，我真诚的感激您仁慈开明的统治。您是我的榜样。\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: This was unexpected...
It was YOU!
There are so many people out to get me. Their eyes are staring at me constantly, and I am sure they are plotting against me in open sight.
translation: 外面有许多人想害我。他们的眼神总盯着我看，我很确定他们一定是在光天化日之下策划针对我的阴谋。

original: Avoid open spaces, they are dangerous
translation: 别出门了，那些人太危险

original: Accuse everyone publicly!
Execute [FromFrom.GetHerHim]!
True humility is about showing humility when it is against our desires. A humble [Root.GetManWoman] submits to proper authority, even if [Root.GetSheHe] dislikes his lawful liege.
translation: 真正的谦逊是能克制住自己的好恶。一个谦逊的[Root.GetManWoman]应当服从领主，哪怕[Root.GetSheHe]并不喜欢领主本人。

original: Submit to [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]!
I will never bend my knee
will hear of our submission
My dear [This.GetTitle], I am your humble servant, and while I may not have always viewed you as favourably as I should, I sincerely regret my behavior.\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 我敬爱的[This.GetTitle]，我是您谦恭的仆人，有时我可能没有全心全意的顺从您的决议，我为这种行为诚挚地忏悔。\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Good News!
True humility is about showing humility when it is against our desires. A humble [Root.GetManWoman] submits to God, even if [Root.GetSheHe] may dislike the Pope himself.
translation: 真正的谦逊是能克制住自己的好恶。一个谦逊的[Root.GetManWoman]应当向上帝奉献一生，哪怕[Root.GetSheHe]并不喜欢教宗。

original: Submit to the Throne of St. Peter
Never!
Recognising virtues and talents that other possess is truly a virtue. I am truly blessed by having a Marshal that is more formidable warrior than I could ever dream of being.
translation: 能发现他人的美德和天赋才是真正的美德。能拥有一位强大的超乎我想象的军事总管，我真是三生有幸。

original: Honor [Root.job_marshal.GetHerHim] for [Root.job_marshal.GetHerHis] skill!
is honored for [This.GetHerHis] skill
translation: 因为[This.GetHerHis]能力而受到了表彰

original: My dear [This.GetTitle]. I just wish to inform you of how much I appreciate your talent and recognize that it is beyond my own.\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 我亲爱的[This.GetTitle]。我希望你能知道，你的天赋远远在我之上，我很庆幸能拥有你这样的人才。\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Thank you
I am very ambitious, but I also know that I am not great at everything. Being humble means I can recognize the limit of my talent, and not reach for what is beyond my grasp.
translation: 我是个很有野心的人，但我也知道我不可能面面俱到。谦逊让我能认知到自己能力的极限，不至于去干那些自己掌控不了的事情。

original: I must be humble.
Ambitions are more important!
translation: 保持自己的野心更重要！

original: Recognising virtues and talents that other possess is a virtue. I am truly blessed by having a [Root.GetChancellorName] who is a marvel at diplomacy.
translation: 能发现他人的美德和天赋才是真正的美德。我很幸运能有[Root.GetChancellorName]来处理外交事宜。

original: Recognising virtues and talents that other possess is truly a virtue. I am truly blessed by having a Spymaster who is brilliant in rooting out plots.
translation: 能发现他人的美德和天赋才是真正的美德。我很幸运能有一位算无遗策的间谍总管。

original: Recognising virtues and talents that other possess is truly a virtue. I am truly blessed by having a [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] who is a devout teacher.
translation: 能发现他人的美德和天赋才是真正的美德。我很幸运能有[Root.GetLordSpiritualName]来做我的神学导师。

original: Recognising virtues and talents that other possess is truly a virtue. I am truly blessed by having a Steward that truly knows how to govern a realm.
translation: 能发现他人的美德和天赋才是真正的美德。我很幸运能有一位真正懂得如何治理领地的财政总管。

original: Reward my Steward!
Thank God for my Steward
translation: 感谢主赐予我这样杰出的财政总管

original: Ignored Patriarch's request
Buy Indulgence for my Sins
translation: 为消除我的罪孽购买赎罪券

original: The Holy Father will hear our plea for salvation.
translation: 圣父教宗会听到我们对救赎的祈求。

original: Bought Indulgences
Refused Indulgences
An emissary comes from [From.GetBestName], with hopes of buying indulgences to clean [From.GetHerHis] sins. While [From.GetSheHe] has committed some very grave sins, this shows sincere regret.
translation: [From.GetBestName]派来了一个使者，希望购买赎罪券来清除[From.GetHerHis]罪孽。[From.GetSheHe]确实罪行累累，不过这次的忏悔确实很有「诚意」。

original: Grant absolution
will cry tears of joy at our reply.
translation: 将对我们的回应喜极而泣。

original: The Holy Father has granted us absolution!
translation: 圣父教宗已赦免了我们！

original: Glory to God!
Defended me against the Pope
translation: 在教宗的压力下保护我

original: Banishing heathens!
Imprisoning heathens!
A procession of monks have arrived at our castle, protesting that we are keeping a Bishop in our prison. They claim that we are sinning against the law of God!
translation: 一队修士来到了我的城堡，向我们抗议我们囚禁主教的行为。他们说我们正在犯下对抗上帝的律法的大罪！

original: Acknowledge their demands.
Disperse the rabble.
There are rumors that one of the rulers of Christendom is employing a heathen in their court. This is not acceptable to the Church, and this earthly lord will surely be damned unless we intervene.
translation: 传言有一位基督教领主在宫廷内雇佣了一个异教徒。这对于教会来说是不可接受的，若是我们不出面干涉，这位世俗领主肯定会永坠地狱。

original: Demand adherence to the Throne of St. Peter!
translation: 要求其永遵圣伯多禄之座的教导！

original: It is not our concern.
will hear the Papal emissary.

An emissary from [From.GetTitledFirstName] has arrived in our court. According to the emissary, the Holy Father is concerned about our employment of heathens as advisors.  The Pope is asking of me to remove them from position.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]派来的使者刚刚抵达了我们的宫廷。据使者所言，圣父教宗对我们任用异教徒担任顾问深感不安。教宗要求我们解除异教徒的职位。

original: Imprison the heathen!
I rule in my realm!
An emissary has returned from [From.GetBestName] bearing glorious news. The emissary says that [From.GetTitledFirstName] has agreed to imprison a heathen that was in [From.GetHerHis] court.
translation: 访问[From.GetBestName]的使者带回了好消息。[From.GetTitledFirstName]同意把[From.GetHerHis]宫廷里的异教徒尽数监禁。

original: Glory to God!
This is a day that the has caused cries of joy to rise up from the pits of hell. An emissary from  [From.GetBestName] is stating that [From.GetSheHe] refuse to follow our demands.
translation: 今天地狱深渊中的魔鬼们一定在愉悦的嚎叫。从[From.GetBestName]那里返回的使者报告说[From.GetSheHe]拒绝了我们的要求。

original: My God, why have you forsaken me?
There are rumors that one of the rulers of Christendom is employing a heathen in their court. This is not acceptable to the Church, and this earthly lord will surely be damned unless we intervene.
translation: 传言有一位基督教领主在宫廷内雇佣了一个异教徒。这对于教会来说是不可接受的，若是我们不出面干涉，这位世俗领主肯定会永坠地狱。

original: Demand adherence to the True Faith!
It is not our concern.
will listen to our emissary.

An emissary from [From.GetTitledFirstName] has arrived in our court. According to the emissary, [From.GetSheHe] is concerned about our employment of heathens as advisors.  The Patriarch is asking of me to remove them from position.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]派来的使者刚刚抵达了我们的宫廷。据使者所言，[From.GetSheHe]对我们任用异教徒担任顾问深感不安。牧首要求我们解除异教徒的职位。

original: Banish the heathen from our realm.
Imprison the heathen!
I rule in my realm!
An emissary has returned from [From.GetBestName] bearing glorious news. The emissary says that [From.GetTitledFirstName] has agreed to banish a heathen that was in [From.GetHerHis] court.
translation: 访问[From.GetBestName]的使者带回了好消息。[From.GetTitledFirstName]同意把[From.GetHerHis]宫廷里的异教徒尽数驱逐。

original: Glory to God!
An emissary has returned from [From.GetBestName] bearing glorious news. The emissary says that [From.GetTitledFirstName] has agreed to imprison a heathen that was in [From.GetHerHis] court.
translation: 访问[From.GetBestName]的使者带回了好消息。[From.GetTitledFirstName]同意把[From.GetHerHis]宫廷里的异教徒尽数监禁。

original: Glory to God!
This is a day that the has caused cries of joy to rise up from the pits of hell. An emissary from  [From.GetBestName] is stating that [From.GetSheHe] refuse to follow our demands.
translation: 今天地狱深渊中的魔鬼们一定在愉悦的嚎叫。从[From.GetBestName]那里返回的使者报告说[From.GetSheHe]拒绝了我们的要求。

original: My God, why have you forsaken me?
There is an errant bishop in one of the [catholic.GetName] realms. Rumours speak of him pledging allegiance to his earthly master ahead of God.
translation: 在[catholic.GetName]国度里有一位不守道的主教。传说他向他的世俗领主宣誓效忠，而不是为上帝奉献一切。

original: Send an emissary to have him replaced.
translation: 派出一个使者去把他撤换掉。

original: Its not my concern
translation: 我们才管不着这事儿呢

original: will listen to our emissary.
The Holy Father is most concerned about the loyalties of the bishops of our realm. [From.GetBestName] is asking for us to replace one of them with a bishop.
translation: 圣父教宗很担心我国的主教们的忠诚度。[From.GetBestName]要求我们将其中一位替换掉。

original: Follow the Papal Demands
Ignore the emissary
translation: 让那个使者一边凉快去

original: An emissary has returned from [From.GetBestName] bearing glorious news. The errant bishop is no longer in a position of authority.
translation: 访问[From.GetBestName]的使者带回了好消息。那个不守道的主教已经被撤职了。

original: Non nobis Domine!
translation: 上主，光荣不要归于我们！

original: Our emissary has returned from [From.GetBestName]. The news he bring is dire indeed, as [From.GetBestName] is refusing to follow our demands.
translation: 访问[From.GetBestName]的使者回来了。他带来了悲伤的消息，[From.GetBestName]拒绝了我们的要求。

original: Tears in Heaven!
We have loyal bishops in other realms. Perhaps we should return them to their de-jure rulers, so that they can guide their earthly lieges.
translation: 有些他国的主教亦在向我们效忠。也许我们应该将他们归还给他们法理上的领主，这样他们才能指导他们的世俗领主。

original: On Earth as in Heaven.
translation: 行在地上如同行在天上。

original: Direct control is preferable.
The Holy Father wishes to inform us that we will now also obey an early liege.
translation: 圣父教宗告知我们应当服从世俗领主。

original: Ok
The Holy Father has granted you the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]. We will serve you faithfully as a vassal, and guide your rule in a Christian way.
translation: 圣父教宗授予你[From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]职位。我们会忠诚地为您效劳，指导您以基督的方式去统治。

original: Non nobis...
Mare incognitum
Mare incognitum
Mamluks
Mamluk
Using this option is viewed as tyrannical, and will lower all of your subjects' opinion of you by §R$OPINION$§!.
translation: 这种行为是暴君所为，这会让你所有下属对你的好感度下降 §R$OPINION$§!。

original: Using this option is viewed as tyrannical, and will lower all of your vassals' opinion of you by §R$OPINION$§!.
translation: 这种行为是暴君所为，这会让你所有封臣对你的好感度下降 §R$OPINION$§!。

original: The §Y$TITLE$§! is, de jure, a vassal of §Y$CLAIMANT$'s§!, which is cause enough for war.
translation: §Y$TITLE$§!在法理上属于§Y$CLAIMANT$§!，这给了我们发动战争的充足理由。

original: The §Y$TITLE$§! is, de jure, a vassal of §Y$CLAIMANT$'s§!, which is cause enough for war.
translation: §Y$TITLE$§!在法理上属于§Y$CLAIMANT$§!，这给了我们发动战争的充足理由。

original: Mare incognitum
The rebels disperse\n
Tired of their old ruler [From.GetTitledName], the peasant rebels of [Root.GetName] have defected and sworn allegiance to me!
translation: 厌倦了他们的旧领主[From.GetTitledName]，[Root.GetName]的农民叛逃并向我效忠了！

original: Excellent! Or is it...?
Your nobles are too autonomous to accept being replaced as leaders.\n(Crown Authority is too low.)
translation: 你的贵族们的自治程度过高，不能由你指定将领。\n（王权过低）

original: Character Excommunicated
Excommunication Lifted
§Y$REL_HEAD$§! has lifted the excommunication of §Y$VICTIM$§! at the behest of §Y$ACTOR$§!!
translation: §Y应$ACTOR$§! 的要求，§Y$REL_HEAD$§!撤销了对§Y$VICTIM$§!的绝罚！

original: Ceuta
§Y$PLAYER$§! not allowed to play §Y$TYPE$§W!
§Y[Actor.GetTitledFirstName]§! is not excommunicated
Has Raised my Levies
translation: 已经动员了我的征召军

original: Has NOT Raised my Levies
Ahvaz
Ahvazian
War becomes invalid
§R(In combat, cannot be disbanded)§!
Acquire the [This.GetFullName]
[From.GetBestName] is plotting to become ruler of the [This.GetFullName].
Old Save Warning
The selected savegame is from version: $VERSION$, the current version is: $CURRVERSION$. \nLoading this file could result in odd behavior and even crashes. Load anyway?
translation: 你选择的存档是基于 $VERSION$ 版本，当前版本是 $CURRVERSION$。\n读取此存档可能导致奇怪的行为甚至崩溃。一定要读取吗？

original: Unknown
The day did not bring any game at all, it had been a futile hunting trip with my guests and my face still burned with shame when the gamekeeper told me about deer parks.
translation: 今天完全没有收获，我和我的客人们度过了一次毫无意义的狩猎，就在我为此脸红的时候猎场管理人告诉我一处鹿苑。

original: The Summer Fair brings all kinds of entertainers to [Root.Location.GetName] and a puppet show got my attention when I heard the giggles, laughter and wolf-whistles from its audience. After watching the show for a while, I realized that one of the characters was supposed to be me!
translation: 各种各样的艺人来到了[Root.Location.GetName]的夏季集市。一阵欢笑传来，把我的注意力引导了一场人偶戏表演中，观众们正在边大笑边狂吹口哨。看了一会儿之后，我发现其中一个角色演的就是我！

original: When I opened the door I saw no one but as I stepped aside to close it a group of acrobats cartwheeled, somersaulted and tumbled in. They performed all sorts of tricks and everyone watching exploded into applause when they finished.
translation: 当我开门时门外空无一人，但是就在我打算关门时，一组杂技演员翻着跟斗涌了进来。他们表演了各式杂技，演出结束时观众们报以热烈的掌声。

original: You would be perfect for my feast!
translation: 你们会为我的宴会锦上添花！

original: Get out! What do you think you are doing?!
translation: 滚出去！这群不知所谓的家伙以为自己在干嘛？！

original: The acrobats performed somersaults, cartwheels and tumbles with great skill during the course of my feast. One of them arrived in a chest seemingly too small to hold a person but he showed us how he, by distorting his body, could fit into the chest...
translation: 杂技演员们在宴会期间出色的表演了后空翻，翻跟斗和侧手翻等杂技。其中一个演员竟然折叠起他的身体，钻进了一个对他的体型而言非常小的箱子里……

original: I almost forgot to eat when I saw the acrobats performing during [From.GetTitledFirstName] and I was the first one to start applauding when their performance was done, wishing they would do just one more somersault, or cartwheel, or even tumble...
translation: 当我看到杂技演员的表演时，我几乎忘记了吃饭。表演结束时，[From.GetTitledFirstName]和我带头鼓起掌来，希望他们再来一个后空翻，翻跟斗或是侧手翻……

original: Bravo! Wonderful!
[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s plate was still almost full when the acrobats had finished their performance and [From.GetSheHe] applauded almost frantically with a blissed look in [From.GetHerHis] eyes.
translation: 当杂技表演结束时，[From.GetTitledFirstName]的盘子里的食物几乎没有动过。[From.GetSheHe]几乎是疯狂的鼓起掌来，[From.GetHerHis]眼中充满喜悦。

original: So [From.GetSheHe] liked the acrobats...?

Its ragged fur and sorrowful eyes made the bear look pitiful, but when its trainer started playing his flute the bear started dancing. The dancing bear and his trainer travelled from fair to fair and this year they came to the Summer Fair in [Root.Location.GetName].
translation: 破烂的毛皮和凄凉的眼神使那头熊看上去楚楚可怜，但当驯兽师开始吹起长笛时，熊不得不随声起舞。驯兽师和跳舞的熊从一个集市旅行到另一个集市，今年他们来到了[Root.Location.GetName]的夏季集市。

original: I died while I was serving [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName], now I hope [Root.Liege.GetSheHe] will honor my last wish and bury me properly...
translation: 我在侍奉[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]中走完我的一生，如今我希望[Root.Liege.GetSheHe]能满足我最后的愿望好好安葬我……

original: Keep your promise or I will haunt you, forever!
translation: 请遵守你的承诺，否则我会永远纠缠你！

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] keeps [This.GetHerHis] promise to [Root.GetTitledFirstName]

[From.GetTitledFirstName] had made me promise I would bury [From.GetHerHim] properly and I keep my promises. I walked beside [From.GetHerHis] coffin to [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s last rest and the wailing of the mourners was almost more than I could bear. [From.GetSheHeCap] died too young!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]曾让我承诺要好好安葬[From.GetHerHim]，如今我履行了诺言。我亲自守护[From.GetHerHis]灵柩来到[From.GetTitledFirstName]的最后安息之地时已经是泣不成声。[From.GetSheHeCap]真是英年早逝！

original: I should help [From.GetHerHis] widow
§Y$PLAYER$§! must select a character to play!
translation: §Y$PLAYER$§!必须选择一个角色来进行游戏！

original: Building a $BUILDING$ in $SETTLEMENT$\n$DAYS$ days remaining
translation: 正在$SETTLEMENT$建造$BUILDING$\n还需要 $DAYS$ 天

original: Right-click a received message to change its priority or appearance.
translation: 右击收到的消息来改变其优先级或显示方式

original: Press F10 to save a snapshot of the map mode you currently have selected.
translation: 按 F10 来截取当前地图模式下的截屏

original: Press F11 to save a screenshot of the game.
translation: 按 F11 来截取当前游戏的截屏

original:
My liege, my work in [FromFrom.Location.GetName] seem to have come to fruition. By bribing, cajoling, extorting, threatening and forging documents, I have managed to fabricate a claim on the [FromFrom.Location.Duchy.GetFullName] presently held by [From.GetTitledName]. I leave it up to you whether to press it or not.

Your humble [Root.GetChancellorName],
[FromFrom.GetTitledName]
translation:
大人，我在[FromFrom.Location.GetName]的工作已经有成果了。通过贿赂、诱骗、敲诈、威胁与伪造文件，我伪造了[From.GetTitledName]控制的[FromFrom.Location.Duchy.GetFullName]的宣称权。请您决定是否使用这个宣称。

您谦逊的[Root.GetChancellorName]，
[FromFrom.GetTitledName]

original: I stumbled into a courtier eating cookies outside the kitchen. The courtier apologised several times and then offered me a cookie as an apology for being in my path and the cynic in me got the best of me. I lost myself in cynical comments about how the courtier was trying to poison me with baked goods, probably spoken out loud.
translation: 我找厨房外和一个正在吃饼干的廷臣相撞了。这个廷臣连连道歉并给了我一块饼干作为挡了我路的赔礼，这时愤世嫉俗的情绪控制住了我。我不由自主的开始刻薄地大声攻击廷臣，说他试图用饼干毒杀我。

original: Average number of years until increase: §G$YEARS$§!
Title made the Primary Title
§Y$CHAR$§! has made the §Y$TITLE$§! $PRONOUN$ primary title.
No navies present which are large enough to transport army
translation: 没有足够的海军来运输这支部队

original: Cannot embark a retreating or fighting army
translation: 不能搭载正在战斗或者撤退中的部队

original: Holding a Large Feast
High Taxes

This office dates all the way back the Roman Republic, and, in this era where a horse is a symbol of power, it is still very important. Although the Master of the Horse delegates the actual day to day running of the actual stables, much of the prestige of this office comes from the responsibility for the stud.
translation: 这个职位起源于罗马共和国，直到如今战马仍是力量的象征，因此这个职位依然是非常重要的。虽然骑士统领也管理马厩的日常运作，不过这一职位之所以受人尊敬是因为他们要管理马群的配种事宜。

original: In an era when hunting was an opportunity to demonstrate horsemanship and martial prowess, the hunt was serious business. The master of the hunt was a position of importance.
translation: 在当代，狩猎是展示马术和武艺的机会，因而是一件严肃的大事。狩猎总管也就成了一个重要职位。

original: With hunting considered the main pastime of the higher nobility, the hounds employed for the some of the hunts are thus important.
translation: 由于狩猎在过去的绝大部分时代都被认为是非常高贵的娱乐活动，在一些狩猎中使用猎犬显得尤为重要。

original: The handing out of alms was an integral part of rulership and religious observance. The one responsible for this task is a very important personage.
translation: 布施救济品是统治活动和宗教仪式的一个组成部分。因此负责这个工作都是非常重要的人。

original: Originally responsible for the organization of feasts and domestic entertainment. Although left mainly in the hands of deputies, the key role at such major occasions makes the post prestigious.
translation: 传统上负责组织宴会和娱乐活动。在如此重大的场合下扮演关键角色，这个职务享有崇高的威望，虽然多数事务其实都是委派给下属和副手去处理的。

original: Right-click on a holding in your realm to access a quick menu for it.
translation: 在领地上点击右键以调出快捷菜单

original: There are no troops left to raise.
There are no ships left to raise.
§Y$CLAIMANT$§! has risen in revolt after a failed arrest attempt by §Y$TARGET$§!.
translation: §Y$CLAIMANT$§!在逃脱了§Y$TARGET$§!的抓捕后起兵反叛了。

original: Overthrow Ruler
$ORDER$Revolt against the rule of $DEFENDER$
Holding a Summer Fair
Teenage Infatuation
Lovers Retreat
Entertainment from my lover
Childhood Sweetheart
Love Scorned
[Root.GetSheHeCapOpp] is so funny and, above all, so beautiful! I think I am falling for [Root.GetHerHimOpp]...
translation: [Root.GetSheHeCapOpp]真是个有趣的人，而且更重要的是，真有魅力！我觉得我爱上[Root.GetHerHimOpp]了……

original: I'll try and talk to [Root.GetHerHimOpp]...
[Root.GetFirstName] and [This.GetFirstName] has a wonderful time together
[This.GetFirstName] scorns [Root.GetFirstName]
[Root.GetSheHeCapOpp]'s not that pretty anyway...

No matter what I was doing or where I was, [From.GetTitledFirstName] always seemed to find me but seemed tongue-tied and shy. I was alone in the library, reading, when [From.GetSheHe] finally got the courage to talk to me...
translation: 不管我在哪里做什么，[From.GetTitledFirstName]都能找到我，不过害羞得舌头打结。我正在图书馆里独自读书，而[From.GetSheHe]终于鼓足了勇气对我说……

original: You are so sweet! I like you too...
[Root.GetFirstName] and [This.GetFirstName] becomes infatuated with each other
Go away! I don't like you...
[Root.GetFirstName] scares [This.GetFirstName] away with [Root.GetHerHis] scornful reply

[From.GetTitledFirstName] and I talked for hours and soon became inseparable. If there was a chore, a homework or anything we could do together, we did it. If it weren't for my nanny then we would have slept in the same bed too.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]和我连续聊了几个小时，我们马上变得形影不离。只要有能一起做的家务活或者作业，我们就一起完成。如果没有我的保姆，也许我们会睡在同一张床上。

original: Is this how it is when you are in love?
I fled from [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s scornful reply and [From.GetHerHis] laughter that followed me down the stairs. How could I ever have felt anything for that, that... idiot?!
translation: 我狼狈的逃离了[From.GetTitledFirstName]的视线，[From.GetHerHis]嘲笑和羞辱似乎跟随着我下了楼梯。我怎么会对那种，那种……混蛋有感觉？！

original: I have to accept that I'm a failure
Who dares, wins
My wife [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] has grown old and less-than-attractive. Maybe a young mistress will bring some excitement to my life?
translation: 我的妻子[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]已经人老珠黄，美丽不再。也许一位年轻女士能给我的生活带来点激情？

original: I'm sure my wife will allow me to indulge myself
translation: 妻子肯定会允许我稍微放纵一下的

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] tries to seduce [This.GetTitledFirstName]
My wife will probably not find out
translation: 我老婆肯定发现不了的

original: No, adultery is a sin

I have noticed how [From.GetFirstName] has stopped looking at me the way [From.GetSheHe] used to do, with a kind of burning desire for me and my body. These days, [From.GetSheHe] looks at the young courtiers with high bosoms and slender waists with the look that used to be reserved for me...
translation: 我注意到[From.GetFirstName]不再像[From.GetSheHe]以前那样，用那种充满着欲望之火的眼神盯着我的身体看了。这些天，[From.GetSheHe]总是用那种眼神盯着那些年轻貌美，丰胸细腰的廷臣……

original: So [From.GetSheHe] did not think I would notice?!
translation: 所以[From.GetSheHe]觉得我发现不了么？！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] makes sure [This.GetTitledFirstName] understands [Root.GetHerHis] feelings about [This.GetHerHim] looking at other women
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]设法让[This.GetTitledFirstName]了解[This.GetHerHim]看着其他女人时[Root.GetHerHis]感受

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s wife is a frail old thing who probably used to be beautiful. No wonder [From.GetSheHe] has started eyeing us lovelier ladies at court...
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]的妻子只是一个不再美丽的老女人。也难怪[From.GetSheHe]开始注意我们这些宫廷里的可爱女郎……

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] is not too hard on the eyes...
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] encourages [This.GetTitledFirstName]'s advances
I deserve someone better than [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 我还是希望能有比[From.GetTitledFirstName]更好的人

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] scorns [This.GetTitledFirstName]'s advances
[From.GetTitledFirstName] responded to my advances and soon we were... engaging in a very stimulating activity. In short: the love-making was amazing!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]回应了我的索求，很快我们就做了非常刺激的事情。简而言之，做爱爽极了！

original: I think I am in love...

The scorn I was met by when I tried to talk [From.GetTitledFirstName] into meeting me somewhere more private really hurt. [From.GetSheHeCap] actually laughed at my advances and told me I was both too old and too ugly for [From.GetHerHim].
translation: 我在试着向[From.GetTitledFirstName]提出到更私密的地方去「深入交流」时被鄙视了，真是心塞。[From.GetSheHeCap]居然嘲笑我的友好举动并告诉我说我对[From.GetHerHim]来说实在是又老又丑！

original: I was taken aback by [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s scorn

[From.GetFirstName] had noticed how I had started looking at the other women at court and the whispers about me flirting with the beautiful ladies at court made [From.GetHerHim] draw some conclusions [From.GetSheHe] obviously did not appreciate. I was yelled at for hours, or so it felt, about the 'sinfulness of adultery' and 'why don't you think I am attractive anymore?'.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]已经注意到我开始观察宫廷里的其他女人，我跟这些女人调情的流言蜚语让[From.GetHerHim]得出了一些明显不让[From.GetSheHe]高兴的结论。我被嚷嚷了好几个小时——也许只是我自己觉得这么久——耳边响着「通奸的罪恶」以及「为什么你不想跟我上床了？」

original: I think [From.GetFirstName] is angry about me flirting with the ladies...
translation: 我觉得[From.GetFirstName]对我和年轻女士调情的事儿已经感到出离愤怒了……

original: It is as if I see [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] for the first time: [Root.Spouse.GetHerHis] good-natured spirit, the interesting and funny quirks [Root.Spouse.GetSheHe] has and how lovely [Root.Spouse.GetSheHe] really is. Could it be that I love my [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]?
translation: 我感觉像是第一次看到[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]：[Root.Spouse.GetHerHis]优雅的气质，[Root.Spouse.GetSheHe]那有趣的怪癖和[Root.Spouse.GetSheHe]那可爱的外表。这是不是意味着我爱我的[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]？

original: Embrace the love I feel for [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]
Deny the love

I have finally gotten a chance to do something special with my special someone and there are so many things I want to do! Should I try to entertain [Root.GetHerHimOpp] at the court, or maybe we should spend some time in my isolated country cottage?
translation: 我终于得了个机会可以对那个特别的人做点特别的事儿了！我想做的事情很多，我应该在宫廷内取悦[Root.GetHerHimOpp]，还是在一个偏僻的乡村小屋里共度一段美好时光呢？

original: I shall take [Root.GetHerHimOpp] to my isolated country cottage
translation: 我要带[Root.GetHerHimOpp]去偏僻的乡村小屋

original: I'll sponsor entertainment at the local court
translation: 我要召艺人来我的宫廷

original: Nah, I'll spend the time with my friends instead
translation: 算了吧，我和朋友一起过

original: No matter what I do, my sweetheart never seems happy, complaining that we never do anything exciting together and sulks when I tell [Root.GetHerHimOpp] I have too much to do to be able to entertain [Root.GetHerHimOpp] all the time. Having a lover is more hard work than I thought!
translation: 不管我做什么，我的甜心都不高兴，一直在抱怨我们没有一起做过激动人心的事情，并且在我告诉[Root.GetHerHimOpp]我公务繁忙，不能整天陪[Root.GetHerHimOpp]的时候大发雷霆。恋爱比我想象中要累多了！

original: Throw a big party for [Root.GetHerHisOpp] entertainment
translation: 举行一个大派对来取悦[Root.GetHerHisOpp]

original: Take [Root.GetHerHimOpp] to do something dangerous, like hunting
translation: 带[Root.GetHerHimOpp]去做些危险的事儿，比如打猎

original: [Root.GetSheHeCapOpp] gets what [Root.GetSheHeOpp] deserves

I caught them together in our own bed, [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] and [Root.Spouse.GetHerHis] lover! I screamed for [Root.Spouse.GetHerHis] lover to get out and then confronted [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] about this...
translation: 我将[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]和[Root.Spouse.GetHerHis]情人捉奸在床！我尖叫着把[Root.Spouse.GetHerHis]情人赶走，然后开始向[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]发出质问……

original: In our own bed?!
translation: 还特么的在我们的婚床上？！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] confronts [This.GetTitledFirstName] about [This.GetHerHis] lover

I thought [From.GetFirstName] would be gone for several hours, so when [From.GetSheHe] opened the door to the bedroom and caught my lover and I in a rather embarrassing embrace and, after [From.GetHerHis] initial surprise, shouted at my lover to get out I was speechless. [From.GetSheHeCap] demanded that I stopped seeing my lover, or else...
translation: 我以为 [From.GetFirstName]会离开几个小时，所以[From.GetSheHe]打开卧室大门就刚好把我和我的情人捉奸在床，[From.GetHerHis]开始惊讶了几秒，然后就咆哮着叫我的情人滚出去，我无言以对。[From.GetSheHeCap]要求我再也不去见我的情人，否则的话……

original: I won't break it up!
translation: 我不会断绝和情人的关系的！

original: Anything for the sake of domestic peace!

I don't know what has happened lately, no matter what my lover does I feel irritated and have actually started to avoid [Root.GetHerHimOpp]. Our relationship brings me only irritation, it is as if we have grown apart...
translation: 我不知道后来发生了什么，不管我的情人做什么，我都觉得恼火，并开始避开[Root.GetHerHimOpp]。我们的关系留给我的只有不适，好像我们分手了一样……

original: I don't love [Root.GetHerHimOpp] anymore

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has avoided me for some time, and the rare occasions when we meet have turned from the love-filled evenings I remember to hours of arguing and disagreement. It did not come as a shock when [From.GetTitledFirstName] told me [From.GetSheHe] wanted to end our relationship but it hurt more than I thought it would.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]躲着我已经有一段时间了，难得的相聚也不再是我记忆中的充满爱意的夜晚了，而是充满了争执与口角。当[From.GetTitledFirstName]告诉我[From.GetSheHe]想要结束这段关系时，我并不感到惊讶，只是感到比预料中更加伤心。

original: In the end we parted as friends...

Since we were young, we had always felt there was something between us, something that made certain situations more awkward than they should have been. Our teenage infatuation has deepened and grown into something more, something that is hard to explain...
translation: 从我们小的时候开始，我们就觉得我们之间好像有些，有些什么东西让事情变得更尴尬。我们少年时的感情逐渐成长成了更加……不太好描述的东西……

original: Our infatuation has turned into love
Does [This.GetTitledFirstName] feel the same as I do?
This was just something for us growing up
translation: 只是些成长中的烦恼罢了

original: Has the teenage infatuation turned into affection between [This.GetTitledFirstName] and [Root.GetTitledFirstName]?
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]和[Root.GetTitledFirstName]之间的青春期迷恋变成了爱情吗？

original: The teenage infatuation I felt for [From.GetTitledFirstName] has turned into something more, maybe love, and I know [From.GetTitledFirstName] feels the same way as I do.
translation: 年少时我对[From.GetTitledFirstName]的迷恋已经转变成了，也许是爱情，而且我知道[From.GetTitledFirstName]也这样觉得。

original: So this is love...?

[From.GetTitledFirstName] and I used to have a... teenage crush on each other and I met [From.GetHerHim] today and the old feelings welled up. Before I could say something embarrassing, [From.GetTitledFirstName] laughed away our teenage infatuation and told me that [From.GetSheHe] is still fond of me.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]和我曾经在青少年时互相有些……「迷恋」。今天我遇到了[From.GetHerHim]，旧日的感情又重新浮上心头。在我说到什么尴尬的事情之前，[From.GetTitledFirstName]对我们青少年时的事儿一笑置之，并告诉我[From.GetSheHe]依然喜欢我。

original: Yes, it was only a teenage infatuation...
translation: 是啊，那只是青春期的迷恋罢了……

original: But I loved you...
Imam
Your Highness
Children are born with a fraction of their parents' dynasties' total Prestige.
translation: 孩子出生时就拥有其父母家族威望的一部分

original: Agnatic Succession means only males can inherit.
translation: 男性继承法意味着只有男性有继承权

original: Agnatic-Cognatic (a.k.a. Male Preference) Succession means females can inherit only if there are no valid males.
translation: 男性优先继承法意味着女性只在没有男性继承人时才有权继承

original: Under Seniority Succession, the oldest member of the dynasty inherits.
translation: 在年长者继承法下，最年长的家族成员会继承头衔

original: Under Primogeniture Succession, the oldest legitimate child inherits.
translation: 在长子继承法下，最年长的合法子嗣会继承头衔

original: Under Gavelkind Succession, the inheritance is divided among the children.
translation: 在均分继承法下，头衔会分割给所有孩子

original: We have decided to immediately revoke your title as [ThirdPartyTitle.GetFullName]. Failure to hand it over peacefully will lead to war.
translation: 我们决定即刻剥夺你的[ThirdPartyTitle.GetFullName]头衔。拒绝和平交出头衔将引发战争。

original:
My liege, I have tried to make [From.GetBestName] realize what a benevolent and peaceful ruler you really are, but sinister forces at [From.GetHerHis] court have been hard at work to discredit my every move and distort my every word. I am afraid that in the end the visit seems to have done more harm than good.

Your humble [Root.GetChancellorName],
[Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledName]
translation:
我的领主，我努力使[From.GetBestName]意识到您是个优雅而爱好和平的人，但是[From.GetHerHis]宫廷里的恶势力歪曲我说的每个字，令我的每个动作都被质疑。恐怕这次拜访带来的害处将多过好处。

您谦卑的[Root.GetChancellorName]，
[Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledName]

original: §Y$CHAR1$'s§! opinion of §Y$CHAR2$§!
Character Imprisoned
§Y$VICTIM$§! has been imprisoned by §Y$ACTOR$§!
Character Released from Prison
§Y$VICTIM$§! has been released from §Y$ACTOR$'s§! dungeon
Character Banished
§Y$VICTIM$§! has been banished from §Y$ACTOR$'s§! lands
Character Assigned a Job Action
§Y$CHAR$§! has been sent to §Y$JOB$§! in §Y$COUNTY$§!
Total troops in County: §Y$VALUE$§!
Beheaded a member of my dynasty!
Love Poem
Beautiful Flower
Precious Item
My child shows every sign of being infatuated with a courtier and follows the person in question everywhere.
translation: 各种证据表明我的孩子受到了一个佞臣的蛊惑，成天和不三不四的人在一起。

original: Aw, how sweet...
Maybe it will pass
translation: 事情应该会自己变好的

original: Separate them
My love is married to another [Root.GetManWoman] and it pains my soul I will never be able to marry [Root.GetHerHimOpp] myself. Oh, how cruel love can be!
translation: 我的至爱和另一个[Root.GetManWoman]结婚了。我再也不能和[Root.GetHerHimOpp]在一起的事实使我的灵魂饱受煎熬。问世间情为何物，直叫人生死相许！

original: I will write a poem of my pain
translation: 我把我的心痛写成一首诗

original: Wine will cure my pains
I shall seek help from prayer
[Root.GetSheHeCapOpp]'s married, I should forget [Root.GetHerHimOpp]
I drink to forget and remember my trouble no more. I have gained the Drunkard trait.
translation: 我用喝酒来让自己忘记那些不想记住的事情。我获得了酒鬼特质。

original: The unsatisfying relationship with a married [Root.GetManWomanOpp] is really becoming irksome. I wish I could love [Root.GetHerHimOpp] openly, without fearing everyone's scorn...
translation: 同[Root.GetManWomanOpp]偷偷摸摸的关系越来越让我厌烦。我希望我可以在大庭广众之下向[Root.GetHerHimOpp]表达我的爱意，而不必在意别人的看法……

original: And thus it ends...
Maybe it can still work...
No, I will make it work!
Seeing another [Root.GetManWomanOpp] behind my spouse's back is becoming quite troublesome for me, the lies tear at my soul and my longing to be with my lover is almost too much.
translation: 除了我的配偶以外还有另一个[Root.GetManWomanOpp]的事实让我十分苦恼，无数被戳破的谎言撕扯着我的灵魂，并且我跟我爱人在一起的渴望几乎达到极限了。

original: It's time to end such affairs and settle down
It will work out if I give it a bit more effort
translation: 如果我再努力一些，说不定就行了

original: I don't care for my spouse
I am planning a special occasion with my lover, but my wife is quite insistent on alternate plans. Who is more important to me, my lover or my wife?
translation: 我和我的情人计划了一次特殊的约会，但是我的妻子似乎也想约我共度那个时段。妻子和情人谁更重要呢？

original: Ignore my wife, and go visit my lover
translation: 无视妻子，去找我的小情人

original: Arrange a ball and invite my lover
translation: 安排一次舞会，但也邀请情人来参加

original: Your wife [This.GetFirstName] meets your lover at the ball and learns about your adulterous relationship
translation: 你的妻子[This.GetFirstName]在舞会上遇见了你的情人，了解了你在外的风花雪月

original: Spend time with my wife instead
translation: 还是花点时间陪陪我的妻子

original: You have lost that loving feeling for your lover
translation: 你对你的情人失去了兴趣

original: I was glad [From.GetFirstName] wanted to arrange a ball and I invited all my friends for a night I would never forget. The ball was wonderful, until I met my husband [From.GetFirstName]'s lover.
translation: 我很高兴[From.GetFirstName]举办了一个舞会并邀请了我所有的朋友，相信我会拥有一个难忘的夜晚。一切都相当美好，直到我遇到了我丈夫[From.GetFirstName]的情人。

original: How could [From.GetSheHe] do that to me?
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] hates [This.GetTitledFirstName] for inviting [This.GetHerHis] lover to the ball
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]憎恨[This.GetTitledFirstName]，只因为邀请[This.GetHerHis]情人参加舞会一事

original: My wife [From.GetTitledFirstName] came up to me, slapped me and left the ball. My lover came running after her and gave me a look that meant trouble ahead. My wife [From.GetFirstName] and my lover had met and my wife had learnt about our adulterous relationship.
translation: 我的妻子[From.GetTitledFirstName]走上前来，搧了我一个耳光便离开了。我的情人紧接着也跑了出去，同时用眼神告诉我大事不好。我的妻子[From.GetFirstName]撞见了我的情人，从而知道了我们「纯洁的友谊」。

original: And now she hates me
My wife has retired to the convent for a short while, to gather her thoughts and find some peace, maybe even God.
translation: 我的妻子现在去了修道院，开始思考她的状况并试图从主那里获得一些安慰。

original: Perfect occasion to spend time with my lover!
translation: 同我的情人幽会的最佳时机！

original: Be discreet about spending time with my lover
translation: 慎重考虑是不是该把时间用来陪情人

original: Only see my lover on friendship terms
translation: 我还是向情人发朋友卡吧

original: Spend the time working instead
I love [Root.GetHerHimOpp] and [Root.GetSheHeOpp] loves me, we are both adults and nothing or nobody will stop us getting married!
translation: 我爱[Root.GetHerHimOpp]，[Root.GetSheHeOpp]也爱我，我们都成年了，没有人可以阻止我们在一起！

original: We elope to get married
Our eloping caught the attention of [This.GetTitledFirstName]
Two people eloped, got married without anyone's consent except their own and it falls to me as their liege to either accept the marriage or do something about it.
translation: 有两个人私奔了，他们在除了他们自己之外没有任何人同意的情况下就结婚，作为他们的领主，该怎么处理他们由我决定。

original: Order them seized
The elopers are caught and imprisoned
The elopers are caught and banished
Accept their marriage
[From.GetTitledFirstName] could not accept our marriage and now my [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] and I finds ourselves in the prison of [From.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]不能接受我们的婚姻，现在我的[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]和我都被[From.GetTitledFirstName]抓进了监狱。

original: Curse you, [From.GetTitledFirstName]!

I almost regret eloping with [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] as it caused us to be banished by [From.GetTitledFirstName]. But they say love conquers all and at least I have my [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] with me in my misery.
translation: 我几乎已经对[Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]私奔的决定产生了动摇，因为我们现在都被[From.GetTitledFirstName]驱逐了。但是，常言道爱情能战胜一切，现在至少我还有[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]与我共患难。

original: Banishing us for getting married? That's low even for you!
translation: 就因为我们结婚就驱逐我们？你真是太 low 了！

original: We both want children, [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] and I, but we haven't been blessed with any yet. What do we do wrong?
translation: [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]和我都想要个孩子，但我们总是得不到命运的垂青。是我们做错了什么吗？

original: Ask for [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]'s help with our childless marriage
Meet with [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] every night
I had a fiery row with my wife [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName], worse than any we ever had before. My lover is eager to comfort me and I could really use some comfort right now.
translation: 我同我的妻子[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]大吵了一架，我对她的愤怒远超过去。我的情人想来「安慰」我，我现在也需要一些「愉悦」。

original: Retire to the country manor with my lover for a while
translation: 到乡间同我的情人放松一下

original: I can have my lover in my castle
translation: 我要把她带进我的城堡

original: Your adulterous affair is discovered by your wife [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 你的风流韵事被你的妻子[This.GetTitledFirstName]发现了

original: I am strong, I don't need comfort!
The 'comfort' my lover offered me has resulted in her being pregnant!
translation: 在同我的情人「放松」之后，我发现她怀孕了！

original: How wonderful!

Still fuming with anger after the fiery row with [From.GetTitledFirstName], I saw [From.GetHerHim] kiss another woman in the garden and then take her by the hand, leading her somewhere more private I am sure.
translation: 我还在为着和[From.GetTitledFirstName]的争吵而耿耿于怀时，又撞见了[From.GetHerHim]在花园里亲吻另一个女人，接着带她去了一个更私密的地方。

original: I hate him!

The constant quarrels with [From.GetTitledFirstName] and [From.GetHerHis] adulterous affairs has brought me to a boiling point. If I ever loved [From.GetHerHim], that love has disappeared with this latest betrayal.
translation: 同[From.GetTitledFirstName]的持续争吵和[From.GetHerHis]风流韵事让我火冒三丈。如果说之前我还爱着[From.GetHerHim]，那么这份爱也随着这不忠的行为而彻底消失。

original: I loathe, no, I hate [From.GetTitledFirstName]
has a fallout with [This.GetHerHis] spouse [This.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]
No matter how discreet I have been with my lover, my [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] still manages to grow suspicious of my behavior. I think I might have tried too hard to be inconspicuous...
translation: 无论我同我的情人多么小心，我的配偶[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]仍然对我产生了怀疑。我觉得我这样遮遮掩掩好辛苦……

original: Tell [Root.Spouse.GetHerHim] it's none of [Root.Spouse.GetHerHis] business
Tell [Root.Spouse.GetHerHim] you do important things
translation: 告诉[Root.Spouse.GetHerHim]我在做很重要的事情

original: Make empty promises to [Root.Spouse.GetHerHim] about spending more time
translation: 给[Root.Spouse.GetHerHim]开空头支票许诺多陪陪对方

original: Spend more time at home as [Root.Spouse.GetSheHe] wishes
My lover accused me of loving my spouse [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] more than [Root.GetHerHimOpp].
translation: 我的情人抱怨我爱自己的妻子[Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]爱得比[Root.GetHerHimOpp]更多。

original: Buy [Root.GetHerHimOpp] an expensive gift to prove my love
translation: 为[Root.GetHerHimOpp]买一件贵重的礼物来表达我的爱

original: Take [Root.GetHerHimOpp] to my country manor for some quality time
translation: 带[Root.GetHerHimOpp]到我的乡间别墅度过一段美好的时光

original: Assure [Root.GetHerHimOpp] of [Root.GetHerHisOpp] importance by words only
Tell [Root.GetHerHimOpp] that [Root.GetSheHeOpp] is absolutely correct
I heard the news from my lover first, then the whole court was buzzing with the news. My spouse [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] had made my adulterous affair public!

original: It's such a stress-relief

translation: 我想给我爱的人一个惊喜，选什么好呢？一首包含我对[Root.GetHerHimOpp]深情的诗，一束同我的爱一样美丽的花，又或者一件能永久见证我对[Root.GetHerHimOpp]的爱的首饰？

original: Being male, unmarried and almost handsome in a court filled with young women who all seek your attention is not half bad. A particularly young wench, almost irresistible, desires the pleasure of my company...
translation: 身为一个未婚且英俊潇洒的美男子，整个宫廷的年轻女性都希望引起你的注意。特别是一位令人无法抗拒的女孩，她一定在渴望着我的陪伴……
