Final $TYPE$: §Y$VALUE$§!
Final $TYPE$ based on Levy size($LEVY$): §Y$VALUE$§!
translation: 基于征召军规模（$LEVY$）的$TYPE$总计：§Y$VALUE$§!

original: I was simply passing time at the tournament when I saw two knights argue over honor. I knew straight away that the argument was spurious and the result would be unnecessary bloodshed. I attempted to mediate the dispute and they told me that at least one of the knights should survive the resulting duel.
translation: 我在比武大会中只是在打发时间。突然我看到两位骑士在为荣誉而争吵。我知道他们荒谬的争吵必然分不出结果，最终一定会演变为流血事件。我试着调解纠纷，他们告诉我至少一位骑士能活过决斗。

original: Stopped Commerce in all Church Squares
translation: 教堂广场的商业活动停止

original: Prima Noctae
Peasants are forbidden to sell goods within City walls
translation: 禁止农民在城内卖东西

original: The Church collect an extra tithe on free peasants
translation: 教会向自由民征收额外的什一税

original: Not in a Civil War
Carcassonian

Fish! Fresh fish straight from the river!' 'Fruits and vegetables, a day or two old!\n\nThe clergy in [Root.GetName] is not happy about the merchants setting up stalls in all the Church squares, and demands that it be forbidden.
translation: 「卖鱼啦！新鲜的河鱼！」「水果和蔬菜，昨天刚采摘的！」\n\n[Root.GetName]的教士们对教会广场上卖东西的小贩们颇为不满，并请求我们颁令禁止。

original: I agree
They do no harm, let them stay
translation: 让他们留下又不会有什么坏处

original: The burghers of [Root.GetName] demand that city law be set higher than canonical laws but the bishops protest, declaring that the law of the Church should supersede the law of the city.
translation: [Root.GetName]的市民要求城市法的效力高于教会法，但是遭到主教抗议。主教们宣称教会法应该取代城市法。

original: I agree with the burghers
The laws should be equal
translation: 两部法律应该是平等的

original: An old legal right, almost forgotten by all but the barons, called Prima Noctae or Droit du Seigneur, is the subject of a heated debate. The barons in [Root.GetName] claim that it is their right to take the virginity of their serfs' maiden daughters and the serfs are protesting against 'such a barbaric right!'.
translation: 一项几乎被除了男爵们之外的所有人都忘却的古老法律——初夜权——成为了讨论的热点。[Root.GetName]的男爵认为他们有权占有领内所有处女的初夜，领民则抗议这纯属「野蛮人的权利」。

original: Let the barons have some fun
That isn't and shouldn't be legal. I forbid it
translation: 这种丧病的权力绝不合法。禁止它！

original: They come from smaller farms, some with a goat or a pig to sell, some with only a bushel of vegetables or fruits, others with a whole wagon of produce. The peasants sell their produce inside the city walls but the burghers protest against it and want to forbid it.
translation: 他们来自小农场，有的牵着羊或猪来贩售，有的则带着大量的水果蔬菜，甚至有带着一马车货物的。这些农民在城市里贩卖他们的货物，而市民们对此表示抗议，希望禁止这种行为。

original: The peasants always cause trouble. Don't let them in!
translation: 农民总是招来各种各样的麻烦，别让他们进来！

original: They should be able to sell their produce inside the city
translation: 他们应该有在城内售货的权利

original: The forest is not big enough for the barons. They demand hunting rights on the Church lands after chasing all the game to the Church's side of the forest and having to stop the hunt unless they'd risk the anger of the Church.
translation: 对男爵们来说，森林还不够大。在为得到教会土地上的森林使用多种花招无效之后，他们要求在教会土地上自由打猎而不用担心教会怒火的权利。

original: It's not a big deal. Let them hunt on the Church land.
translation: 这不是啥大事，就让他们去教会土地上狩猎吧。

original: Stay on your side of the forest!
translation: 呆在你们自己的森林里！

original: The clergy is not satisfied with collecting a tithe from all free peasants, they demand the right to collect an extra tithe! A tithe is a tenth of the peasant's harvest or a tenth of the craftsmen's production, if the priests were allowed to collect another tithe it would double the taxes and thus make the peasants protest wildly.
translation: 教士对向所有自由民收什一税还不满意，他们要求征收额外的什一税！什一税要求农民缴纳收成的十分之一，手工业者缴纳手工制品的十分之一。允许教士征收额外的什一税，税额将被加倍，这肯定会引起广泛抗议。

original: An extra tithe? Sure!
The peasants would starve, I won't allow it
translation: 农民会挨饿的，我不允许这事儿

original: Rich merchants want to buy titles and the Barons protest, saying their titles are priceless. Mere merchants should not be allowed to gain the noble rights just because they can afford it!
translation: 富商希望购买爵位，遭到男爵的抗议，声称他们的爵位是无价的。商人们不应该被允许用金钱购买爵位！

original: As long as I get paid, I couldn't care less
translation: 只要我拿到钱就行，其他的我不关心

original: Titles cannot be bought
The Burghers, the Clergy and the Barons all claim the right to spoils from shipwrecks that capsize outside of [Root.GetName]. The rights to the spoils will be given to...
translation: 市民们，牧师和男爵们都声称有权从[Root.GetName]之外倾覆的沉船中掠夺财物。这份权利会交给……

original: ...the Church
...the Commoners
...the Nobility
...the Crown

The travelling dancers first danced for us and, while dancing to a fast and glad tune which made me want to dance, invited everyone to join them. I danced until I panted and my face was red, then I had to sit down and rest for a while, watching the dancers and the courtiers having more fun than in a long time...
translation: 云游舞者一开始只是为我们跳舞，随着舞步的加快和美妙的音乐，我们开始都跃跃欲试，这时舞者邀请所有人一起跳舞。我一直跳到气喘吁吁，不得不坐下来休息一会，观看舞者和廷臣们继续跳舞作乐……

original: I'd like to hire you for my feast!
translation: 我想雇佣你们在我的宴会上表演！

original: Great fun, but my guests are too old for this
translation: 很有趣，不过我的客人们都很老派，受不了这个

original: Timurids
Timurid
Cannot create or usurp a title of the same or higher rank as our liege's
translation: 不能创立或篡夺与领主头衔同级或更高级的头衔

original: Affected by a Crown Law title
NOT Affected by a Crown Law title
The Iron Khan

My liege, the great Khan Timur has gathered many of the horse clans of Central Asia under his banner, intent on creating an empire to rival that of the legendary Genghis Khan himself. His fearsome horde has been sighted in Khiva, poised to overrun the ancient realm of Persia.
translation: 我的领主，帖木儿汗将中亚诸多游牧部族落聚集到自己麾下，想要建立足以媲美传奇的成吉思汗的大帝国。他可怕的大军已经在希瓦出现，直指席卷整个波斯。

original: Is there no end to these steppe warriors?
translation: 难道游牧部落永远无穷无尽吗？

original: Amphibious landing
Achievements Enabled
Achievements Disabled
$SIDE$ troops gets $PERC$ morale.\n
$SIDE$ troops are reinforced by $PERC$.\n
$SIDE$ troops take $PERC$ losses.\n
Attacking
Defending
$CHAR$ cannot join any of the current wars fought by $CALLER$

Ask §Y[Recipient.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName]§W for permission to invade the realm of §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W. This will cost you §R[GetPietyCost]§W [Player.Religion.GetPietyName], but will allow you to start a war for control of the §Y[Recipient.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]§W.
translation: 请求§Y[Recipient.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName]§W允许入侵§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W。这会花费 §R[GetPietyCost]§W [Player.Religion.GetPietyName]，但会允许你发动夺取§Y[Recipient.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]§W的战争。

original: Ask §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W for permission to invade the realm of §Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetTitledFirstName]§W. This will cost you §R[GetPietyCost]§W [Player.Religion.GetPietyName], but will allow you to start a war for control of the §Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]§W.
translation: 请求§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§W允许入侵§Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetTitledFirstName]§W。这会花费 §R[GetPietyCost]§! [Player.Religion.GetPietyName]，但会允许你发动夺取§Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]§W的战争。

original: A War you were NOT part of ends
translation: 这场战争你不是任何一方的成员

original: The §Y$WAR$§! has ended: $OUTCOME$
Abandon Ambition
Abandon the ambition to $PLOT$?
§RCannot cancel a plot that has been set in motion!§!
translation: §R无法取消已付诸行动的阴谋！§!

original: We are taught that to uphold the virtue of charity, we have to ransom our prisoners, and to forgive offenses willingly. I have prisoners in my dungeons...
translation: 我们被教导要实践宽容的美德，我们应该释放囚犯，并宽恕进攻者。我的地牢中还有囚犯……

original: I gave a small shriek when [From.GetTitledFirstName] touched my arm, which didn't really help when I tried to defend myself from [From.GetHerHis] accusations about my cowardice...
translation: 当[From.GetTitledFirstName]触碰到我的手臂时我发出了轻声的尖叫，这令我无法避免来自[From.GetHerHis]对我懦弱行径的指责……

original: $RULER$ cannot change another regular Law in $TITLE$ until $DATE$
You gain more Prestige in battle as an ally than as a primary participant.
translation: 在战斗中，作为盟友要比作为主要参加者能得到更多威望

original: Hold down shift while giving orders to a unit to create a custom path.
translation: 按住 Shift 移动部队可以自定义行动路线

original: §YWe can Call in Allies§!
We can ask the following allies to support us:\n$LIST$
translation: 我们可以要求下列盟友支援我们：\n$LIST$

original: §YVassal Levies Raised too Long§!
The following Vassals are upset about their levies:\n$LIST$
translation: 下列封臣对动员他们的部队感到不满：\n$LIST$

original: §YWrong type of Holding in Demesne§!
Switch to the previous holding in this demesne
translation: 切换到这个省份的上一个领地

original: Switch to the next holding in this demesne
translation: 切换到这个省份的下一个领地

original: Open outliner category configuration
Lock/Unlock outliner openness
Toggle the outliner open/close
Increased Crown Authority
All De Jure Vassals
All De Jure Vassal Titles
They are our enemies!
Capua
Capuan
'I have won a complete victory'
'I like the way you're thinking'
'I have won the war!'
'I'm winning the war'
'The war is indecisive'
'I still have untouched armies and holdings'
'I accept your offer of a white peace'
translation: 「我方接受无条件和平的提议」

original: 'I have lost the war...'
We have attacked the enemy in $PROVINCE$.
We have been attacked in $PROVINCE$.
Our holding in $PROVINCE$ is under siege.
translation: 我们在$PROVINCE$的领地正遭到围攻。

original: We have laid siege to the holding in $PROVINCE$.
Due to enemy presence in our homelands, only $NUM$ of $TOTAL$ troops will be able to return home.
translation: 由于敌人攻入我国领土，$TOTAL$ 名士兵中只有 $NUM$ 人可以安全返乡。

original: Due to not being in friendly territory, only $NUM$ of $TOTAL$ troops will be able to return home.
translation: 由于不在友方领土，$TOTAL$ 名士兵中只有 $NUM$ 人可以安全返乡。

original: Due to not being in a friendly port, only $NUM$ of $TOTAL$ ships will be able to return home.
translation: 由于不在友方港口，$TOTAL$ 艘船中只有 $NUM$ 艘可以安全返乡。

original: Ruler Stewardship Bonus
I tried to not show how flattering it was to be asked about celibacy and if I had some sort of advice. Unfortunately, I had not the time to talk about right now...
translation: 当被问及独身生活的问题并希望我给予一些建议时，我努力不将其描述得十分吸引人。不幸的是，我现在没有时间详谈……

original: Maybe tomorrow?
...or ever!
I only do it because I fear God's wroth!
translation: 我这样做只是因为我畏惧上帝的怒火！

original: A celibate life can be hard, but I fear life is harder for one of my courtiers whose sins our confessor often attack during his sermons. The poor sod's vices and lusts is controlling him and I don't envy him his time in purgatory.
translation: 独身生活很艰苦，不过我怀疑我的一个廷臣的生活更艰难，他的罪孽总是在布道时成为神父批评的对象。罪恶和淫欲控制着他，我一点也不羡慕他如同地狱般的生活。

original: I should be a good [Root.Religion.GetName] and help him
translation: 我应该成为一个好[Root.Religion.GetName]信徒并帮助他

original: His sins are his own, no one can help him
translation: 他的罪行是他自己犯下的，没人能帮助他

original: Not one more time!!
The Flagellant
Flagellants mortify their own flesh by whipping it
translation: 鞭笞派教徒通过鞭打自己的身体来进行苦修

original: Every other day, processions with people singing, carrying crosses and whipping themselves are marching through [Root.Location.GetName]. They ask to be forgiven for sins they have committed and believe the flagellation to work better than any other penance.
translation: 每隔一天，伴随着歌声，一群携带着十字架，鞭打着自己的人会出现在[Root.Location.GetName]。他们乞求自己犯下的罪行得到宽恕并且相信并且相信自我鞭笞比任何忏悔都有效。

original: I will join them and my sins will be forgiven!
translation: 我要加入他们，赎清罪孽！

original: will join the flagellants
Isn't there a less painful way to be forgiven?
translation: 没有痛苦轻一些的赎罪方式吗？

original: We walked through the village, lashing our skins with whips for every step we took. As a [Root.GetTitle] this felt slightly humiliating but I stood tall and continued my pilgrimage together with my fellow flagellants.
translation: 我们走过乡村，每走一步都鞭打自己的身体。作为[Root.GetTitle]，我会感到一些屈辱，但我挺直腰板，继续与我的教友们一起在朝圣之路上行进。

original: I deserve this
note [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s attempt at penance
[From.GetTitledFirstName] walked together with the others through the streets of [From.Location.GetName], praying and flagellating [From.GetHerselfHimself] with a cattail whip made of knotted cords.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]在[From.Location.GetName]的街道上与教友们一起行走，祈祷着并用打结的蒲鞭鞭笞着[From.GetHerselfHimself]。

original: What an admirable [From.GetManWoman]!
[This.GetTitledFirstName] is admired by [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
That's idiotic!
Even before [From.GetTitledFirstName] opened [From.GetHerHis] mouth, I knew [From.GetSheHe] would comment on the pilgrimage I took while flagellating myself.
translation: 在[From.GetTitledFirstName]张开[From.GetHerHis]嘴巴之前，我就知道[From.GetSheHe]将会对我鞭打自己的苦修进行评论。

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] thinks I'm admirable!
[From.GetSheHeCap] thinks I'm an idiot!
I'll sell those books I've already read
translation: 我会卖掉那些我已经读过的书

original: My [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] of course!

[From.GetTitledFirstName] had a huge rose pinned to [From.GetHerHis] clothes and as soon as I saw it I realized it couldn't have come from any place else than [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]'s garden. I wanted to rip the rose off [From.GetTitledFirstName] and yell at [From.GetHerHim] for having an affair with my spouse, but I controlled myself and turned away.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]将一朵大大的玫瑰别在[From.GetHerHis]衣服上，当我看到那多玫瑰我就意识到它只可能来自[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]的花园。我想扔掉[From.GetTitledFirstName]的玫瑰并怒斥[From.GetHerHim]和我的配偶有一腿，但我控制住自己，转身离开了。

original: I have had enough!
Why didn't [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] give the rose to me?
It hurts, but [Root.Spouse.GetSheHe] didn't intend it to be a token of love. I hope...
translation: 这很伤人，但是[Root.Spouse.GetSheHe]并不认为这是爱情信物，我希望……

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has lost the joy of life. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Depressed trait.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]失去了人生的乐趣。[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]获得了沮丧消沉特质。

original: I have lost the joy of life. I have gained the §YDepressed§! trait.
translation: 我失去了人生的乐趣。我获得了§Y沮丧消沉§!特质。

original: My lovely garden does not bring me as much joy as it used to do. I have lost the Gardener trait.
translation: 我可爱的花园不再给我带来欢乐。我失去了园丁特质。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] is feverish and has a headache. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has gained the Ill trait.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]头疼脑热。[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]获得了身患疾病特质。

original: I don't feel so good. I have gained the §YIll§! trait.
translation: 我感觉不太好。我获得了§Y身患疾病§!特质。

original: I have given the order that a summer fair should be held in [Root.Capital.GetName] this summer!
translation: 我已下令在[Root.Capital.GetName]举办一场夏季集市！

original: Might be easier to remove it if I ask someone to help me
translation: 如果要求别人帮助我，可能会更容易去除它

original: I'll ask my child to help me
translation: 我将要求我的孩子帮助我

original: [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] can help me
[This.GetTitledFirstName] is asked to help remove the beehive
I'll do it myself. This might hurt...
translation: 我亲自来。这可能会伤到我……

original: I was asked by [From.GetTitledFirstName] to help [From.GetHerHim] remove a beehive and I reluctantly followed [From.GetHerHim] to take a look at it before I made any rash promises.
translation: 我被[From.GetTitledFirstName]要求帮助[From.GetHerHim]移除蜂巢。在我作出轻率的承诺之前，我不情愿地跟着[From.GetHerHim]看了蜂巢一眼。

original: It looks rather harmless. I'll help you
translation: 它看上去无害，我会帮你

original: This is as close as I'll get to that monstrosity!
translation: 我不会再靠近那个可怕的东西一步！

original: With [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s help it was easy to remove the beehive, until we dropped it on the ground...
translation: 在[From.GetTitledFirstName]的帮助下移除蜂巢很容易，直到我们将它扔到了地上……

original: None of us were harmed but the bees wasn't happy...
translation: 我们没有受伤，但是蜜蜂很不高兴……

original: The bees managed to sting [From.GetTitledFirstName] several times!
The bee sting made [From.GetTitledFirstName] ill

I had to remove the beehive all by myself when [From.GetTitledFirstName] refused to go near it. It looked harmless but [From.GetTitledFirstName] was sweating and looked as if [From.GetSheHe] would faint at any time.
translation: 由于[From.GetTitledFirstName]拒绝靠近，我不得不亲自动手。它看上去无害，但是[From.GetTitledFirstName]汗流浃背，似乎[From.GetSheHe]随时都可能晕厥。

original: Coward! It's your fault if the bees sting me
translation: 胆小鬼！如果我被蛰了都是你的错！

original: My alchemy 'kit' arrived with a small book, containing instructions for how to mix different substances without causing things to explode or start burning. It might be a good idea to read the book before fiddling with the alchemical ingredients...
translation: 我的炼金工具与一本书同时送到，上面介绍了如何混合几种物质而不引发爆炸或火灾。在动手前先读一读那本书似乎是个不错的主意……

original: Nah, I start fiddling with it at once
starts fiddling with alchemy without any prior knowledge
translation: 不先储备些知识就开始炼金

original: Read up on alchemy first
researches alchemy before fiddling with it
I should be careful. I still remember what happened to my uncle...
translation: 我要加倍小心，我还记得我叔叔身上发生的事情……

original: The liquid dripped through the labyrinth of glass bottles blown in various forms and sizes. As it reached the end of the funnel, a drop of the liquid quivered on the edge before it slowly fell towards the awaiting bowl.
translation: 玻璃瓶中滴下的液体融合成不同的形状和大小。当它到达漏斗的尽头时，一滴液体在滴进下面的碗之前在边缘滑动。

original: Careful now...
Exploding Experiment!
Lead and Gold!

As the liquid slowly but steadily dripped into the bowl I waited eagerly for the substance to cool down. When finally every last drop was in the bowl darkness enveloped the castle and I had to light a candle to properly examine the liquid, which exploded.
translation: 随着液体缓慢而稳定的滴入碗里，我焦急地等待着混合物冷却。当最后一滴液体落入碗中时，夜幕已然降临，我不得不点燃蜡烛来检查液体，然后爆炸发生了。

original: What will [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] say when [Root.Spouse.GetSheHe] sees my face?
My eyebrows!
The disappointment I felt when the liquid solidified was quickly replaced by joy when I realized that, instead of a Philosopher's Stone, I had created...
translation: 液体凝固时我很沮丧，但意料之外的喜悦随之而来，将沮丧一扫而光，我没有创造出点金石，但我创造出了……

original: Gold! I have created gold!

This illness is slowly killing me, sucking the life out of my bones and brain. Being a mystic I have knowledge of a potion rumored to cure any illness but even as I prepare the potion I fear it might kill me instead of curing me...
translation: 恶疾在慢慢折磨着我，透过每一块肌肤，每一寸骨节，每一丝思维，吸噬着我的生命。作为一个神秘主义者，我拥有传说中能治愈一切疾病的灵药的知识。但当我配药时，我觉得这剂药可能不会治好我，反而会要了我的命……

original: I throw the potion away. I trust [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] will cure me!
translation: 我扔掉了药。我相信[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]会治好我！

original: A real doctor should be able to make me better
translation: 一个真正的医生应该能让我好一些

original: I am desperate for a cure, the sickness seems to get worse for every day. I heard [From.GetTitledFirstName] had concocted something that [From.GetSheHe] said could cure all illnesses.
translation: 我极度渴望痊愈，病情每天都在恶化。我听说[From.GetTitledFirstName]曾经提到过[From.GetSheHe]有什么东西能治愈一切疾病。

original: My child is sick, the potion might cure it
translation: 我的孩子病了，这药也许能治愈我的孩子

original: My spouse [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] is sick...
I don't dare let anyone try it
translation: 我不敢让任何人尝试它

original: So be it!
[This.GetTitledFirstName] is threatened with torture

[Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]'s justice has brought peace to a troubled county. Fewer crimes are committed and fewer complaints are heard in the province. The peasants have never been happier!
translation: [Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]的公正严明为混乱的领地带来了平和。犯罪和抱怨越来越少，农民们非常开心！

original: Wrong Government Type
Lifted Excommunication
§Y$NAME$§! is a close member (§Y$REL$§!) of your Dynasty
Discovered Backing a Plot
Ask that §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W stop backing a plot.
Ask that §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! stop backing §Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetTitledFirstName]'s§! plot to §Y$PLOT_NAME$§!.
If [Recipient.GetSubjectPronoun] refuses, we have a reason to imprison [Recipient.GetObjectPronoun].
translation: 如果[Recipient.GetSubjectPronoun]拒绝，我们将有理由逮捕[Recipient.GetObjectPronoun]。

original: None
Small Feudal Tax
Large Feudal Tax
Harsh Feudal Tax
Glory to me
I must report this to my liege!
translation: 我必须向领主报告此事！

original: Expose [FromFrom.GetHerHim] immediately!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] was not impressed
[From.GetTitledFirstName] was really scared!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] was angry at me!

It was horrifying but oddly satisfying to watch [From.GetTitledFirstName] demonstrate [From.GetHerHis] skills on a recently captured traitor. After demonstrating how much pain [From.GetSheHe] could cause before the man passed out, [From.GetSheHe] taught me how to cause maximum pain and damage but still keep the victim alive for several days, or even weeks.
translation: 观看[From.GetTitledFirstName]在一个新近捕获的叛徒身上展示[From.GetHerHis]技能是一件既恐怖又令人愉悦的事。在展示完[From.GetSheHe]能在人死前为其施加多么大的痛苦后，[From.GetSheHe]教我怎样制造最大的痛苦和伤害，却能让受害者继续活几天，甚至几周。

original: A great opportunity to test the brazen bull!
What is wrong with me? This isn't who I am!
translation: 我到底怎么了？这不是我！

original: I am no longer able to torture another human being, no matter the reason. I have lost the §YImpaler§! trait.
translation: 我不再折磨其他人，无论原因为何。我失去了§Y拷打爱好者§!特质。

original: No, no, not the brazen bull!
Not even the brazen bull can make me confess!
...or maybe we should share a less bloody interest
translation: ……也许我们应该讨论不那么血腥的兴趣

original: I used to love the clang of a sword's blade against another and the satisfaction I felt after defeating my opponent. Not anymore. I have lost the Duelist trait
translation: 我曾经沉醉于倾听剑刃相击的声音和击败对手后的愉悦。现在不再这样了。我失去了决斗者特质

original: Do you dare accept this challenge to a duel?
translation: 你敢不敢接受决斗的挑战？

original: I'm sorry! I don't want to fight!
I have tired of this. Next time, I won't accept the challenge!
translation: 我厌倦了这一切。下次，我不会接受挑战了！

original: Please don't hit me!
Marshal [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName], take care of this duel for me!
The animals in the forest will from now on be safe from my bloodlust. I have lost the Hunter trait.
translation: 森林里的动物将从此摆脱我的嗜血。我失去了猎人特质。

original: I'll ask my son to take care of the boar
translation: 我将让我的儿子处理野猪

original: I overheard a conversation between two courtiers, they discussed how some in the court feared the Wild Hunt and laughed at how superstitious some can be. I decided to look into this and find out who this superstitious mind belonged to. Maybe I can have some fun with this fear of the Wild Hunt?
translation: 我无意中听到两个廷臣讨论宫廷中的一些人是怎样地害怕野外狩猎，并嘲笑那些人的迷信。我决心深入调查，寻找是谁那么迷信。也许我能用这找点乐子？

original: A child of mine is afraid of the Wild Hunt!
translation: 我的一个孩子害怕野外狩猎！

original: Save & Quit
Are you sure you want to Save & Quit to desktop?
translation: 你确定要储存并退出到桌面吗？

original: Save & Quit
Does a Quick Save and then quits the game
Quit
Can only create barons in owned, minor baronies
translation: 只能在直辖男爵领分封男爵

original: The realm view is where you can get a quick overview of your realm. Your vassals, economy, history and more. Click on the shield next to the portrait to find it. You can click the 'De Jure' checkbox to see the regions that are tied to your title by bonds that will never break.
translation: 点击角色旁边的盾形图标可以打开领地界面。在领地界面模式下，你可以对你的领地有一个大概了解。比如你的领地的封臣，经济，历史以及更多。你也可以在该界面选择「法理」选项框，这样可以查看那些与你的头衔紧密相连的领土。

original: Piety. How the church sees you. Hover over the sum to see monthly gain or loss. Hover longer to see exactly what the sources are. You can also gain or lose piety from actions.
translation: 虔诚指教会对你的态度。鼠标悬停在虔诚值上可得到每月虔诚值增加或减少的数量，鼠标悬停更长时间还可得到增加或减少的来源。当然你也可以从行动中获得或失去虔诚。

original: Score. This is your dynasty's total score. The score is calculated by adding the prestige and piety of each of your rulers at the time of their death. This will determine your final rank.
translation: 得分。这是你的家族的所有得分，它是通过你的所有统治者在位期间获得的威望和虔诚来计算的。这将最终决定你的排名。

original: For different types of information, there are different map modes. We are in the terrain map mode right now. The independent map mode paints the name of the countries neatly over the map. If you zoom further in, the name of the individual provinces will pop up instead. Switch to the independent realms map mode now to see more defined borders.
translation: 在不同的地图模式下，你可以获得不同类型的信息。现在我们在地形地图模式下，在这里，你可以清楚地看到各个国家的名称。将镜头拉近，你还可以看到各个地区的名称。现在转到独立领主地图，这里我们可以清楚地看到边界。

original: The game starts paused. You can do all of the aforementioned actions while the game is paused or unpaused. However, nothing will actually happen until you unpause.
translation: 游戏暂停，无论是游戏暂停还是开始的时候，上述操作你都可以进行。但是如果不取消暂停，暂停时的操作都不会生效。

original: Alerts. These round icons show important things that need an action from you. They can be related to, for example, succession or diplomacy. Keeping an eye on them can make or break your fortunes, so ignore at your peril!
translation: 警告。这些圆形图标显示了一些你必须采取行动的重要事情，可能与比如继承和外交之类有关的事情。时刻关注他们，你将会创造奇迹，忽略他们的话后果自负！

original: A ruler does not rule alone. You have access to five types of advisors that help you. The first advisor is the chancellor, who assists your ruler in the diplomatic field. Further you have the marshal, who is your resident military expert. Then you have the steward, who is in charge of your economy. The spymaster is responsible for keeping you safe from internal as well as external intrigue, and the chaplain is your guide in everything spiritual.
translation: 统治者无法单独治理一个国家。你可以依靠五种类型的顾问帮助你。第一种是外交总管，他将在外交领域帮助你。此外你还可以雇佣军事总管。作为一个贵族，财政总管是必须的，他将负责你的经济。间谍总管则能保护你远离国内与国外的阴谋。最后宫廷牧师将是你的精神导师。

original: These vassals can perform missions for you. The chancellor can for example forge claims on foreign lands, while the steward can bolster taxes, all for the benefit of your dynasty! They also add their stats to yours.
translation: 这些重臣可以为你执行任务，例如外交总管可以为你伪造外国土地的宣称权，财政总管则可以为你征收更多的税金。这些都会对你的家族有好处！此外，他们能增加你的属性。

original: Succession laws are what determines who you will play as next and what they will inherit. The most common start is that your eldest son will inherit most of your titles while your younger son(s) also gets their share. This kind of inheritance is called gavelkind.
translation: 继承法将决定着你接下来要扮演的角色以及能够继承的领地。一开始最常见的是让长子继承你的主要头衔，其他孩子分割剩下的。这种继承法叫均分继承法。

original: Diplomacy is what we call the interactions between characters. It can be to start wars or send a child off to be educated. Now, to find a number of characters who you can use different diplomatic options on, click the ruler portrait to continue.
translation: 外交就是指角色之间的互动。你可以发动战争也可以将孩子送过去抚养。现在找出一些你可以进行外交的角色，点击他们的角色头像进行操作。

original: This time, also let's raise some levies from a vassal. If you were going to war, you'd probably like to raise all available levies using the button towards the top. For this exercise we just need a few though, so raise the personal levies of the Earl of Fife.
translation: 现在，让我们从封臣处征兵。如果你即将开始战争，你可以征召全部的兵力。而在这个教程中，我们只需要一部分兵力就足够了。现在你可以点击法夫伯爵头像右侧的动员私人部队按钮，动员他的部队。

original: To gather them all in one place, select the new troops by clicking their shield and move them to the first troop by right clicking on the province. Unpause to continue.
translation: 为了将这些部队聚集在一个地方，点击第二支部队的图标，然后右击第一支部队所在的省份，就可以将这些部队聚集到同一个地方。然后取消暂停。

original: Merge
Fleet
We also have ships available. Click the military tab.
translation: 我们当然也有海军，点开军事界面。

original: Onto the Ships?
To load your troops onto the ships, select the army and in the top bar you can see an embark button.
translation: 选择你的部队，在最顶部你会发现一个登船的按钮，点击它就可以将你的部队运到船上。

original: Right now that button is grey though. To find out why, click your ships.
translation: 现在这个选项是灰色的，如果你想知道原因，点击你的船只察看。

original: Ships
Splitting Troops
Onto the Ships
Off the Ships
As soon as your ships arrive, let's offload the troops in the Moray province.
translation: 当你的舰队到达之后，在莫雷登陆你的部队。

original: Landing
Make sure you have the ships selected, then click on the tab to the upper right to select the army. Now you can click on Moray to have the troops go ashore there.
translation: 确定你的舰队已经被选择，然后点击右上方的按钮选择部队。现在你可以点击莫雷让你的部队向岸上登陆。

original: War
Learn about claims, casus bellis, peace outcomes and war score
translation: 学习关于宣称权，宣战理由，战争结果以及战争得分的相关知识

original: Military and Combat
Learn about units, levies, mercenaries, battles and sieges
translation: 学习关于部队，征召，雇佣兵，战斗与围攻的相关知识

original: After reviewing the county stats, open the council screen.
translation: 在检查过省份的状况后，打开宫廷界面。

original: Job Done
Now you got an event pop-up. It says you now have a claim on the county which means you can go to war over it. Read it and click 'Press the claim' to continue.
translation: 现在跳出了一个事件。它说你现在拥有一个宣称权，意味着你可以通过战争获得这个头衔。阅读这个事件，然后点击「索取宣称」来继续。

original: Click on declare war. Now you'll see the casus belli we just arranged for. Click on claim Søroyar and hit send.
translation: 点击宣战选项。你可以看到我们拥有的宣战理由。选择宣称南岛之后点击发送。

original: Plotting allows you to pursue goals in a less confrontational way than direct war. Other people can also plot against you though, so you always need to be prepared. Click the intrigue tab to continue.
translation: 除了战争之外，密谋也能帮助你达成目标。当然其他人也会对你施展阴谋，因此你要时刻防备着。点击密谋界面以继续。

original: Religion with all that implies, can have a big impact on what happens in your game. Crusades, piety and your own religious vassals will all play their part. The church head, which will be either a Pope, Caliph or an Ecumenical Patriarch, is the religious power for each of their religions. The Pope can not just start holy wars, he is also the one who can grant you a divorce for example. Click the religion tab to continue.
translation: 信仰会对你的游戏中将发生的事情起到重大影响。十字军，虔诚和你的宗教下属都有各自的作用。宗教领袖，可能是教宗，哈里发或大祭司是各自宗教的信仰力量。教宗不仅可以发动圣战，也可以让你离婚。点击宗教界面继续。

original: The hierarchy in Crusader Kings is strict, and those down the chain of authority provide troops and taxes to the ones above them, regulated by laws. Click next to continue.
translation: 《王国风云 II》中的等级制度十分森严，下级领主必须对上级领主承担法律规定的兵役和赋税义务。点击下一步继续。

original: I found [From.GetTitledFirstName] in [From.GetHerHis] bedchamber, hiding from the sound of soldiers practising their sword fighting. I could not help but scorn [From.GetHerHis] cowardice.
translation: 我发现[From.GetTitledFirstName]躲在[From.GetHerHis]卧室里，以逃避士兵们斗剑的声音。我忍不住蔑视[From.GetHerHis]怯懦。

original:
I have discovered a plot where $PLOTTER$ seeks to $PLOTNAME$.

Your humble spymaster,
$SPYMASTER$
translation:
我发现了一个阴谋：$PLOTTER$试图$PLOTNAME$。

您谦卑的间谍总管，
$SPYMASTER$

original:
I have discovered a plot where $PLOTTER$ seeks to $PLOTNAME$.

Your humble spymaster,
$SPYMASTER$
translation:
我发现了一个阴谋：$PLOTTER$试图$PLOTNAME$。

您谦卑的间谍总管，
$SPYMASTER$

original: I was deeply absorbed in writing an ode to a nightingale when I was approached and asked if I could recite some of my poems for the court. Everyone had gathered inside to ride out the storm that had hit [Root.Location.GetName] so I had a fairly large audience.
translation: 当我得知我可以为王室朗诵一些诗歌之后，我深深的沉迷于对夜莺的颂歌的写作中。每个人聚集在一起以躲避席卷[Root.Location.GetName]的风暴，因此我有相当多的观众。

original: This is a poem about courtly love... *ahem*
translation: 这是一首关于宫廷的爱情诗……*啊咳*

original: I think this poem about a sinful character will be entertaining...
translation: 我觉得这首关于一个罪孽深重的角色的诗歌很有趣……

original: The life of a saint is always good material for poetry...
translation: 圣人的生活，始终是诗歌的好材料……

original: You wouldn't appreciate my poems
Mildly disappointed
Liar
Sad
If we accept, we will be part of $WARLIST$
translation: 如果我们接受，我们将是$WARLIST$的一员

original: I cannot get the words to flow as they used to and the idea to write my thoughts in poetry has ceased to be a necessity. I have lost the Poet trait.
translation: 我再也写不出以前那样的优美文字，并且用诗歌叙述我的思想的想法已经不再那么强烈。我失去了诗人特质。

original: You must help me!' the courtier said, 'I need a poem for my sweetheart and I have no time to write it myself. Can you please help me?'
translation: 「你必须帮我！」廷臣说，「我需要给我的情人写一首诗，但没有时间。你可以帮我吗？」

original: Of course! What kind do you want? An ode, a sonnet?
translation: 当然，你想要什么类型的诗？颂词还是十四行诗？

original: For a small sum I would be happy to provide you with a love poem
translation: 只需要一小笔钱，我将为你写一首好情诗

original: You should give your sweetheart a poem of your own!
translation: 你应该自己给你的情人写诗！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] gave a piece of paper to one of the courtiers, who gave [From.GetHerHim] a kiss on the cheek before running of. Did my spouse [From.GetFirstName] just give a love poem to a courtier?
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]在跑开之前吻了我的一个廷臣，并给了[From.GetHerHim]一张字条。难道我的配偶[From.GetFirstName]刚刚给了一个朝臣一份情诗么？

original: It probably does not mean anything
Why do I never get poems from [From.GetFirstName]?
translation: 为什么我从来没有从[From.GetFirstName]那里拿到过情诗？

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] misunderstood the situation

I hadn't really thought about the implications of giving a love poem to a courtier, no matter what that courtier would do with it. My [From.GetFirstName] misunderstand and believed it to have more significance than it had.
translation: 不管廷臣如何处理我给的那份信，我没有任何特殊的意思。我的[From.GetFirstName]误会了并且相信那有特殊含义。

original: Honey, the poem was for the courtier's sweetheart, no one else
translation: 亲爱的，这首诗是给朝臣的心上人

original: Do these earrings prove my love for you?
translation: 这些耳环能证明我对你的爱吗？

original: I gave the poem to my sweetheart and [Root.GetSheHeOpp] read it slowly while I waited patiently for [Root.GetHerHisOpp] reaction. The poem was lovely and my only regret was that I hadn't written it myself...
translation: 我将诗歌给了我的心上人，并且一边听[Root.GetSheHeOpp]慢慢朗诵一边耐心地等[Root.GetHerHisOpp]反应。这首诗非常好，可惜不是我自己写的……

original: [Root.GetSheHeCapOpp] kissed me when [Root.GetSheHeOpp] had read 'my' poem!
The real poet finds out about your little lie
translation: 真正的诗人发现了你的谎言

original: I had to tell [Root.GetHerHim] wherefrom I got the poem...
translation: 我不得不告诉[Root.GetHerHim]我从哪里得到这首诗的……

original: It took me a while to realize the poem everyone talked about was one of mine, [From.GetTitledFirstName] had mislead everyone and managed to seduce someone with the poem.
translation: 过了一会我才反应过来人们讨论的那首诗是我的，[From.GetTitledFirstName]误导了大家，并且打算用这首诗诱惑某些人。

original: Confront [From.GetTitledFirstName]
is confronted about lying about the poem by [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
[From.GetSheHeCap] seduced my little girl!
[From.GetSheHeCap] seduced my wife!
Forgive [From.GetTitledFirstName]

[From.GetTitledFirstName] confronted me about me telling people I had written the poem and I told [From.GetHerHim] I hadn't exactly told anyone I had written the poem. People had just assumed that because I had given the love poem to my sweetheart I had written it.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]质问我是不是对其他人说是我写的诗。我告诉[From.GetHerHim]我没有对任何人这么说。人们只是那样认为，因为那首情诗是写给我恋人的。

original: I'm sorry, but I would do it again if I could!
translation: 我很抱歉，但如果可能，我以后仍然会这么做！

original: I landed face first in the mud that covered the cell floor and tried to get up before the door closed. 'I did not give you that poem so you could go around seducing people with the help of it!', [From.GetTitledFirstName] snarled.
translation: 起初我的脸深深陷入了泥土里，但我仍然试图在大门关闭之前站起来。「我并没有给你那首诗，所以你不能用他去诱惑人们！」[From.GetTitledFirstName]咆哮道。

original: Is this about your daughter? I'm sorry!
translation: 这个和你的女儿有关吗？我很抱歉！

original: I did not seduce your wife, she threw herself at me!
translation: 我并没有勾引你的妻子，她自己送上门的！

original: No matter how hard I try, I cannot think of anything that rhymes with orange! I must have lost my muse, my inspiration is absolutely gone. Oh woe is me, what shall I do?
translation: 无论我怎么努力，我都没法想出一个押韵的词了！我肯定失去了缪斯女神的青睐，我完全没有灵感了。哦，我该怎么办？

original: I will find a new muse!
translation: 我会找到一个新的缪斯！

original: My inspiration is gone, possibly forever!
translation: 我也许已经失去了灵感，永远失去了！

original: I... just... have to work harder!

A muse is something more than just inspiration, you must learn to love and cherish your muse or else [Root.GetSheHeOpp] will leave you and take the inspiration with [Root.GetHerHimOpp]. I found my muse when I set my eyes upon...
translation: 缪斯并不仅仅意味着灵感，你必须学好去珍爱你的缪斯，否则[Root.GetSheHeOpp]将会离开你并且带走你的灵感。我找到了我的缪斯……

original: ...a courtier!
is approached by [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and asked to become [Root.GetHerHis] muse
...my [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]!
have fallen in love with [This.Spouse.GetFirstName]
No... I cannot live with [Root.GetHerHimOpp] as my muse...
translation: 不……我无法与[Root.GetHerHimOpp]一同生活，因为我的缪斯……

original: Your eyes are... are like the sea a rainy day!' [From.GetTitledFirstName] told me and scribbled furiously with [From.GetHerHis] quill on the already ink stained paper.\n'You are my inspiration, my muse. I will cherish our love forever!' [From.GetTitledFirstName] added after finishing 'the greatest poem ever! For now, at least'.
translation: 「你的眼睛像……像下起雨的大海一样！」[From.GetTitledFirstName]一边告诉我，一边用[From.GetHerHis]鹅毛笔在已经沾满上墨水的纸上乱写一通。\n「你是我的灵感，我的缪斯。我会永远珍惜我们的爱！」[From.GetTitledFirstName]在完成这首诗后添加道。「这是世上最伟大的诗！至少是迄今为止！。」

original: Well thank you!
You disgust me!
My new muse [From.GetTitledFirstName] almost makes my quills burn with all the poems that want to be released unto paper!
translation: 我的新缪斯[From.GetTitledFirstName]使我的诗歌从鹅毛笔下倾泻而出！

original: Keep my inspiration flowing and I'll love you forever!
translation: 保持我的灵感，我将永远爱着你！

original: No matter how many poems I wrote for [From.GetTitledFirstName] [From.GetSheHe] just scowled at me and claims I 'disgust [From.GetHerHim]'. I feel my inspiration run short for every rejection and I have to admit to myself: [From.GetTitledFirstName] is not the muse I am looking for.
translation: 无论我为[From.GetTitledFirstName]写了多少诗，[From.GetSheHe]都只是怒视着我，并声称我「恶心到 [From.GetHerHim]了」。我觉得我的灵感在一次次拒绝中不断流逝，我不得不承认：[From.GetTitledFirstName]不是我所要寻找的缪斯。

original: I'll have to find inspiration from somewhere else
translation: 我不得不从别的地方找到灵感。

original: I had just mounted my horse and was reaching for my bird when [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] asked me to bring one of our children with me on the hunt.
translation: 我装上马鞍，正找着我的猎鹰，这时[Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]要我带着孩子一起去。

original: Yes, yes. Just hurry up, I'm eager to hunt!
translation: 是，是，快点，我等不及去打猎了！

original: goes hunting with [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
Do I really have to?
I don't want to, and you can't make me!
Why don't you both join me?
A family day with falconing

I saddled my horse as fast as I could, not wanting to wait for the clumsy stable boy to do it, and took my bird from the falconer. My [GetFromRelation] smiled at me and then gave the signal to let the hunt begin.
translation: 我尽可能快准备好了马鞍，没有等那个笨笨的小男孩来做这些，然后带上了我的猎鹰。我的[GetFromRelation]对我笑了一下，然后发出了狩猎开始的信号。

original: Let's go hunt some hares!
translation: 让我们去打一些野兔吧！

original: Wait, I am not ready for this...
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] does not follow [This.GetTitledFirstName] on the hunt
translation: 在狩猎中，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]并没有跟上[This.GetTitledFirstName]的脚步

original: I galloped to catch up with the hunting party but when I saw my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] frown at me, clearly upset with me joining the hunting party, I almost turned my horse around and galloped back to the castle. Why was I told [From.GetFirstName] wanted me to join [From.GetHerHis] hunting party when [From.GetSheHe] didn't want me there?
translation: 我快速追上了狩猎队但我看到我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]皱眉看着我，显然他们对我的加入并不高兴，我几乎立刻调转马头跑回了城堡。既然[From.GetFirstName]不希望我去参加，为什么还告诉我[From.GetSheHe]希望我加入[From.GetHerHis]狩猎队？

original: I ignore [From.GetHerHim] and try to think on the hunt only
translation: 我决定忽略[From.GetHerHim]并且只去想狩猎的事情

original: I'd better turn around, [From.GetSheHe] will be relived when I'm not around
translation: 我最好离开，如果我不在的周围的话，[From.GetSheHe]会感到轻松一些

original: has a good hunt with [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 和[Root.GetTitledFirstName]一起享受狩猎的乐趣

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] shames [This.GetTitledFirstName]
impresses [This.GetTitledFirstName] during the hunt
translation: 在狩猎途中，使 [This.GetTitledFirstName]印象深刻

original: thinks [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has strange priorities during the hunt
translation: 认为在狩猎中[Root.GetTitledFirstName]有奇怪的优先权

original: It was a great day for falconing, the sky was blue and the game was plentiful. My child [From.GetTitledFirstName], although maybe a bit unused to having to gut and skin the hunted prey, did very good and [From.GetSheHe] did not complain once.
translation: 这是个狩猎的好天气，蓝蓝的天空，丰富的游戏。我的孩子[From.GetTitledFirstName]，虽然不习惯处理猎物，但却做的很好，并且[From.GetSheHe]一次也没有抱怨。

original: I think it was good for both of us to do this together
translation: 我认为我们俩一起做比较好

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] refused to gut and skin the hunted prey the falcon brought, and it was pure luck my huntsman managed to grab the bird when [From.GetSheHe] panicked and let go of the tethers when the bird tried to fly off. The day went from bad to worse and I was not very happy when we got back home.
translation: 当[From.GetTitledFirstName]因恐惧不小心松了绳子差点让鸟飞走的时候，[From.GetSheHe]拒绝处理猎鹰带回来的猎物，幸好我的猎人挽回这个失误。今天变得越来越糟糕，当我回家之后我并不是很高兴。

original: This was shameful! How could you disappoint me like this?
translation: 这真是耻辱，你怎能让我如此失望？

original: The wager [From.GetTitledFirstName] and I agreed on was that the one who managed to catch the most prey wouldn't need to gut and skin any of it. I lost and, although I usually would rather not spend a whole hour gutting and skinning hares, this time I was too proud of [From.GetTitledFirstName] to really care about the slimy, gut-wrenching feel of intestines sliding through my hands...
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]和我打赌，谁打到最多的猎物，谁就不需要处理猎物。我输了，虽然我通常不会花上花上很多时间对野兔进行剥皮清理内脏，这次我真的太为[From.GetTitledFirstName]自豪了，都没有在意处理猎物时手里滑过的那种恶心感觉……

original: I am impressed! No one has ever killed so many hares!
translation: 我给别人留下了深刻的印象！从来没有人能打到这么多的野兔！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] was more interested in flowers and herbs than the prey the birds hunted. When it was time to skin and gut the hares [From.GetHerHis] face literally went green and we had to stand back when [From.GetSheHe] lost [From.GetHerHis] lunch.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]对花草的兴趣超过对狩猎野兔和鸟的兴趣。当到处理猎物的时间时，[From.GetHerHis]脸色发绿，[From.GetSheHe]把[From.GetHerHis]午餐都吐了出来，我们只得后退以免被吐一身。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName], you have to get used to this!
I had a lovely day hunting with my birds, [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] and one of our children.
translation: 我和我的猎鹰，[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]还有我的一个孩子愉快地进行了一天的狩猎。

original: We will do this again, soon
translation: 我们以后还会这样的，很快

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName], although already in the saddle and with a bird perched on the pommel of the saddle, chose to leave the hunting party and ride back home.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]，虽然已经骑在了马上并且在马鞍那里挂了一个鸟笼，但仍然选择离开狩猎回家。

original: Why did [From.GetSheHe] do that?
Lowborn males must marry noble women Matrilineally
translation: 出身卑微的男性与贵族女性只能进行入赘婚姻

original: Lowborn females cannot marry noble men Matrilineally
translation: 出身卑微的女性不能招赘贵族男性

original: Has Active Plot
Does NOT have an active Plot
§Y$NAME$§! has left your court for the §Y$TARGET$§!

My liege, my work in [FromFrom.Location.GetName] seems to have come to fruition. By bribing, cajoling, extorting, threatening and forging documents, I have managed to fabricate a claim on the [FromFrom.Location.County.GetFullName] presently held by [From.GetTitledName]. I leave it up to you whether to use it or not.

Your humble [Root.GetChancellorName],
[FromFrom.GetTitledName]
translation:
我的领主，我在[FromFrom.Location.GetName]的工作已经有成果了。通过贿赂、诱骗、敲诈、威胁与伪造文件，我伪造了[From.GetTitledName]控制的[FromFrom.Location.County.GetFullName]的宣称权。请您决定是否使用这个宣称。

您谦逊的[Root.GetChancellorName]，
[FromFrom.GetTitledName]

original: I keep thinking about [From.GetTitledFirstName]. She was the best of wives, and without her, I do so struggle to be a [Root.GetTitle]. Oh, how I miss her....
translation: 我一直在回想[From.GetTitledFirstName]的事情。她是最好的妻子，如果没有她，我要费很大力气才能做一个[Root.GetTitle]。啊，我多么想念她……

original:
My lord, your [Root.GetChancellorName] [FromFrom.GetTitledName] has been trying to create unrest among the nobles in [From.Location.GetName] and tried to encourage me to turn against my liege [From.Liege.GetTitledName]! He failed miserably and I can assure you that this shameless act will not go by without consequences.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
阁下，你的[Root.GetChancellorName][FromFrom.GetTitledName]试图在[From.Location.GetName]的贵族中挑起骚乱，并且试图蛊惑我去对付我的封臣[From.Liege.GetTitledName]！他失败了，我可以向你保证，对于这种无耻的行径，我不会就这么算了的。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: Using a smuggled in rope, [From.GetBestName] almost managed to escape from custody, but the guards caught [From.GetHerHim] in time!
translation: [From.GetBestName]用偷运进来的绳索，差点从监狱逃出来了，但是卫兵及时抓住了[From.GetHerHim]！

original: Return [From.GetHerHim] to [From.GetHerHis] quarters
Throw [From.GetHerHim] back in the dungeon
Throw [From.GetHerHim] in the Oubliette!
My zeal and religious beliefs have led me to become more respected and given me more prestige.
translation: 我的狂热和宗教信仰让我变得更受人尊重，并且让我获得了更多的威望。

original: Agog
'Would you mind helping me with my new hunting bird?'\n\nI was asked to take a look and maybe help train a new falcon for a friend.
translation: 「你介意帮我看看这只狩猎鸟吗？」\n\n一个朋友希望我帮他照看他的新猎鹰，如果能帮他训练下就更好了。

original: I lie and tell my friend it is useless, then offer to buy it
translation: 我对我的朋友谎称这只猎鹰毫无用处，并提出要买下它

original: The falcon is easy to train and fun to hunt with
translation: 猎鹰是很容易训练的，打猎时候带上它会有很多乐趣

original: The falcon is useless and wounds [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 猎鹰毫无用处，可能还会弄伤[This.GetTitledFirstName]

original: For a coin or two I might be able to help you
translation: 给我一点钱我就会帮你

original: The bird will be easy to train
translation: 这只猎鹰是很容易训练的

original: I'll show you all my tricks
translation: 我会向你展现我所有的技巧

original: The falcon was easy to train and it didn't take long before I could take it out hunting without fearing it would try to escape or make a messy kill of its prey.
translation: 猎鹰是很容易训练的，用不了多久就可以带上它去打猎，并且不用担心他会逃跑或胡乱杀死猎物。

original: I should keep it
The former owner, [This.GetTitledFirstName] finds out about what happened to the falcon
translation: 前主人，[This.GetTitledFirstName]发现了猎鹰的状况。

original: I will train it some more and then sell it
translation: 我会再训练一下，然后把猎鹰卖掉

original: The owner will be glad!
The owner,[This.GetTitledFirstName] finds out about what happens to the falcon
translation: 它的主人，[This.GetTitledFirstName]终于弄清楚了猎鹰身上发生了什么

original: No matter what I did, the falcon was hard to train and did not respond in the same way as the birds I kept myself. I was already prepared to give up when something frightened the bird and it attacked me!
translation: 无论我这么做，这只猎鹰都不会向我自己那只那样回应我，它太难训练了。在它因为恐惧而攻击我之后，我已经准备放弃它了！

original: I have to tell my friend this bird cannot be trained
translation: 我不得不告诉我的朋友这只鹰无法训练

original: The owner, [This.GetTitledFirstName], gets the bad news about the falcon
translation: 它的主人，[This.GetTitledFirstName]，知道了关于这只猎鹰的坏消息

original: The former owner, [This.GetTitledFirstName], gets the bad news about the falcon
translation: 它的前主人，[This.GetTitledFirstName]，知道了关于这只鹰的坏消息

original: Before I knew it, I managed to kill the falcon
translation: 在我知道这个消息之前，我杀了这只鹰

original: My friend has to take it back!
translation: 我的朋友不得不把这只鹰带回去！

original: I will wring your neck!
I had put down many hours training my friend's falcon, and how was I rewarded? By my friend taking credit for the well-trained falcon and bragging about how easy it was!
translation: 我已经花了很多时间训练我朋友的鹰，而我得到了怎样的回报？我的朋友现在到处吹嘘那只猎鹰是多么的训练有素，并且训练猎鹰是多么容易的一件事！

original: To the prison with you!
Let my friend brag, I do not care
How could my friend do this to me?
translation: 我的朋友怎么能这样对我？

original: is confronted by [Root.GetTitledFirstName] when [This.GetSheHe] bragged about how simple it was to train the falcon
translation: 在[Root.GetTitledFirstName]吹嘘训练一只猎鹰是多么容易时被[This.GetSheHe]质问

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] offered to buy the falcon [From.GetSheHe] had deemed useless and I was happy to get rid of it. Now, a couple of weeks later I understand [From.GetTitledFirstName] lied to me: the bird wasn't useless, [From.GetSheHe] only wanted me to sell it cheap to [From.GetHerHim]!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]要买那只被[From.GetSheHe]说成是没用的猎鹰，我很高兴的卖给了他。数个星期之后我发现[From.GetTitledFirstName]骗了我：这只鹰并不像他说的那样无用，[From.GetSheHe]只是希望我便宜地卖给[From.GetHerHim]！

original: You lied to me!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] then sold the 'useless' bird with profit!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]随后就高价卖掉了这只「无用的」猎鹰！

original: The falcon managed to wound [From.GetTitledFirstName] when [From.GetSheHe] tried to train it and apparently confirmed [From.GetHerHis] suspicion that the bird was useless.
translation: 在[From.GetTitledFirstName]训练这只猎鹰的时候，这只猎鹰差点弄伤了[From.GetSheHe]。这确认了[From.GetHerHis]怀疑：这只猎鹰是没有价值的。

original: That's too bad. I have to put it down then
translation: 真是太糟糕了，我只好放弃这只猎鹰了

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] killed the bird!
The useless bird was killed by [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 那只无用的猎鹰被[From.GetTitledFirstName]杀死了

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] forced me to take the bird back!

[From.GetTitledFirstName] helped me train my new falcon and was not glad when I started bragging to other people about how easy it had been to train the bird. [From.GetSheHeCap] confronted me and told me [From.GetSheHe] would never help me train another bird, ever again!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]帮我训练了一只猎鹰，但当我向别人吹嘘训练一只猎鹰是多么容易的时候却惹恼了他。[From.GetSheHeCap]找到我，然后告诉我[From.GetSheHe]再也不会帮我训练猎鹰了！

original: What, never again?

I watched with awe when [From.GetTitledFirstName] released my falcon and it swooped down from the sky, killing the hare almost immediately. Despite the fact that [From.GetSheHe] had never trained a falcon before, it hadn't taken long before the falcon was a well-trained death machine.
translation: 我敬畏地看着[From.GetTitledFirstName]放出我的猎鹰，猎鹰从天空俯冲下来，几乎立刻杀死了兔子。尽管事实上[From.GetSheHe]从来没有训练过鹰，但没用多久这只鹰就成了一只训练有素的杀戮机器。

original: Thank you so much!
My friend and I had planned to go hunting together but when he broke his leg I realized I either had to find someone else to accompany me or cancel it altogether.
translation: 我的朋友和我计划一起出去打猎，但当他摔断腿的时候，我就意识到我不得不找其他人陪我一起，或者取消这次打猎。

original: Anyone?
I'll just wait until my friend is better
translation: 我会等我的朋友好起来后再一起去的

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] willingly joins [Root.GetTitledFirstName] for the hunt
When [From.GetTitledFirstName] asked me if I wanted to go hunting with [From.GetHerHim], I gladly accepted. Sadly, the hunt was ruined by [From.GetHerHis] greed.
translation: 当[From.GetTitledFirstName]问我是否愿意和[From.GetHerHim]一起打猎的时候，我很高兴的答应了。可惜的是，这次狩猎被[From.GetHerHis]贪婪毁了。

original: Unacceptable!
[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] should know I will not tolerate this!
translation: [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]应该知道我不会容忍这种事的！

original: We managed to kill too much prey when I went hunting with [From.GetTitledFirstName], so we decided to sell some of the meat. When we had sold everything we got in an argument over the money.
translation: 当我和[From.GetTitledFirstName]他一起狩猎的时候，我们打到了很多猎物，因此我们决定卖掉一些。当我们卖完之后，我们因为钱的分配发生了争执。

original: We hunted in my forest, I should get more than you!
translation: 我们在我的森林里打猎，我应该获得更多的金币！

original: Attackers
Defenders
Left as garrison
Vassals:

Roses are red
Violets are blue
The sun shows its beauty - But true beauty is in you...'
Astonished, I noticed the tears in [From.GetTitledFirstName] as [From.GetSheHe] told me there was nothing more left for [From.GetHerHim] to teach me.
translation:
「玫瑰是红色的
紫罗兰是蓝色的
太阳艳丽无比 - 但真正美丽的是你……」
令我惊讶的是，当[From.GetSheHe]告诉我[From.GetHerHim]再也没有更多东西教我时，我注意到了在[From.GetTitledFirstName]脸上的眼泪。

original: It is truly rewarding
Villagers are starving in [Root.Location.GetName] and a small group of representatives has dared set foot in my castle to petition for help...
translation: [Root.Location.GetName]的村民正在挨饿，而他们的代表竟敢我的城堡下聚集，请求我的帮助……

original: Of course! Take whatever you need!
translation: 当然，拿上你们觉得需要的东西！

original: Refuse to help them

One of the courtiers always treat the servants with contempt and if I hadn't interfered the courtier would likely have beaten one of the servants! I reprimanded the courtier and said: 'Kindness is a virtue, and you should show empathy and trust without prejudice even if your servant is a commoner.'.
translation: 我的一个廷臣经常轻蔑地对待仆人们，如果不是我干预的话，他甚至会打他们！我训斥他说：「善良是一种美德，你应该同情且信任你的仆人，即使你的仆人是平民。」

original: I hope the courtier listened and understood me!
translation: 我希望那位廷臣能理解我的苦心！

original: The kindness in [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s heart cannot melt the ice in others
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]内心的善良无法感化其他人

original: A clumsy servant almost spilled wine all over me and I was about to slap him for his incompetence when [From.GetTitledFirstName] dragged me aside and told me: 'Kindness is a virtue, and you should show empathy and trust without prejudice even if your servant is a commoner.'.
translation: 一个笨拙仆人差点将酒撒到我身上，正当我要给那个无能的仆人一巴掌的时候，[From.GetTitledFirstName]将我拖到一边并告诉我∶「善良是一种美德，你应该同情且信任你的仆人，即使你的仆人是平民。」

original: That's preposterous and I told [From.GetHerHim] that!
translation: 这真是荒谬！我这么告诉[From.GetHerHim]！

original: [This.GetSheHeCap] will hear what [Root.GetTitledFirstName] thinks about this!
No matter what I told [From.GetTitledFirstName], [From.GetSheHe] wouldn't listen and refused to accept kindness as a virtue, not a weakness.
translation: 不管我对[From.GetTitledFirstName]说了什么，[From.GetSheHe]都不听，并且不承认善良是一种美德，反而认为这是一种懦弱。

original: That's... unfortunate
I should try falconry instead
I'll try hunting instead
Poetry is safer, let's try that instead
translation: 读诗更加安全的，让我们试试那个吧

original: Las Pedroñeras
Ucles
Sisante
You must perform at my feast!
translation: 你一定要在我的宴会上表演！

original: My wife [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] is right, I should pursue the title!
translation: 我的妻子[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]是对的，我应该追求那个头衔！

original: Title Revocation Refused
§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W refused the revocation of §Y[ThirdPartyTitle.GetFullName]§W, requested by §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W
University
University
University
Monastic School
Cathedral School
A pretty wench is throwing herself at you.
translation: 一位漂亮的侍女主动对我投怀送抱。

original: I can't resist her.
Mind over body, mind over body...
translation: 控制住自己，控制住自己……

original: The cook has prepared a fine meal, but the priest preached about temperance...
translation: 厨师准备了一顿丰盛的伙食，但牧师宣扬节制……

original: I try to eat modestly but the food is too good!
translation: 我试图吃的文雅一点，但食物太好吃了！

original: I satisfy my hunger with bread and water
After giving my advice on a delicate matter, the courtier asked me to accept a small gift of gold as thanks for my help
translation: 在我帮助廷臣解决了他的棘手问题之后，廷臣希望我接受他的一些金币，作为他对我的感谢

original: I accept the gift reluctantly
translation: 我勉强接受了他的礼物

original: Wasn't my advice worth more than a couple pennies?
translation: 我的建议就值这么几个金币？

original: Work can be tedious and when one problem is solved another one pops up. I tire of having to complete the same tasks over and over again.
translation: 工作是很乏味的，当一个问题解决，又一个出现了。我厌倦一遍又一遍完成相同的任务。

original: Let someone else do this!
I can rest in Heaven
translation: 到了天堂我就可以休息了

original: Her hair is always perfect, men love her charm and looks but she is also intelligent and well-spoken. She has been blessed with beauty, intelligence and success in all things.
translation: 她的头发很漂亮，男人们喜欢她的容貌与魅力，但她也很睿智且能言会道。她几乎拥有所有的东西：美貌，智慧以及成功。

original: Why was [Root.GetSheHe] blessed and not I?
translation: 为什么[Root.GetSheHe]会受到祝福，为什么不是我？

original: It's hard not to envy her, but I am perfect as I am
translation: 很难不去嫉妒她，但我很知足

original: It feels like everyone is trying to trump me! My huntsman killed more prey than I, my councillors found a better solution to the rebellious peasants than mine and I started to feel that everyone was better than me, no matter what.
translation: 我感觉每个人都试图胜过我！我的猎人打到的猎物比我多，我的内阁成员想出来对付农民叛乱的办法比我更有用，不知道为什么，我开始感觉每个人都比我优秀。

original: If they are better than me, then I have to accept that
translation: 如果他们比我优秀，那么我应该接受这个现实

original: I envy them all!
I don't think it was meant to hurt me, but the criticism still stung harder than it should have.
translation: 我认为这不是故意要伤害我，但这些批评仍然深深的刺痛了我。

original: An eye for an eye!
I'll turn the other cheek
I took a good look at myself and thought about my weaknesses and strengths. After many hours of soul-searching, I realized:
translation: 我好好地审视一下我自身，找出我的优点和弱点。在经过几个小时的自省之后，我终于认识到：

original: I have nothing to be ashamed of!
I have many strengths, but more weaknesses
translation: 我有许多的优点，但缺点也不少

original: It was one of those situations where you didn't want to tell the truth in case it would hurt the person, but in the same time, honesty is a virtue...
translation: 有的时候你不想说出真相，因为这也许会伤害到别人，比如现在情况就是如此。但毕竟，诚实是一种美德……

original: Lie and don't hurt anyone
translation: 不，我不会说出来的，我不想伤害别人

original: Be honest and tell it as it is
Run awaaaayyy!
Stay put and fight!
It started as an uneasiness around guests and strangers, then evolved into awkwardness and a strong feeling of discomfort.
translation: 起初，在客人和陌生人之间有一种淡淡的不安，然后，这种不安逐渐演变成了尴尬以及一种强烈的不舒服的感觉。

original: I don't want to meet any new people
translation: 我不想见到任何陌生人

original: I'll just have to try to be more gregarious
translation: 我会尝试变得更加合群

original: I could strive to become better, or I can be satisfied with who I am and what I have.
translation: 我要努力变的更加优秀，否则我将会固步自封，只满足于我现在拥有的东西。

original: I will never be satisfied!
I am content
If my opinion ruled, the world would be a more chaotic but fun place. If I keep following the laws, the world would have less chaos but also be less fun.
translation: 如果我的观点成为主流的话，这个世界将会更加混乱但同时也会更加有趣，反之，如果我固守法律，这个世界虽然会少一些混乱但也会少了很多乐趣。

original: Let my rule begin!
translation: 那还等什么让我们开始吧！

original: Justice should always prevail!
If there is a God, why is the world filled with hardships, grief and heretics?
translation: 如果真的有上帝，为什么世界还会充满困难，悲伤以及异教徒？

original: God has a plan for everything and everyone
God is as clueless as I am
translation: 上帝，和我一样，无知无能

original: The court is filled with young, beautiful men and the attention they give me is making it hard for me to refuse them. Who wouldn't want one of them in their bed?
translation: 宫廷里到处都是年轻漂亮的男人，他们让我很难从他们身上移开注意力。谁能够拒绝得了他们的诱惑？

original: Give in, have some fun!
translation: 放弃无谓的矜持，来享受吧！

original: A woman should suppress her worldly urges
translation: 女性应该抑制内心的欲望

original: Lately I have become afraid that someone might want to hurt me. I am thinking about hiring a, no, two food-tasters and... maybe a bodyguard would be a good idea?
translation: 最近我一直担心有人要谋害我，或许我需要雇用一个，不，两个试毒者，并且……安排一个贴身护卫可能是一个好主意？

original: Food-tasters, bodyguards, anything that can save me!
translation: 我需要试毒者，贴身护卫，还有任何能救我的人！

original: I won't let fear rule my life!
translation: 我不会让恐惧占领我的生活！

original: After I had made another courtier cry, the third one in a short week, I felt a bit embarrassed. Is this really who I am, a cruel [Root.GetManWoman] who likes to hurt people?
translation: 短短一个星期内把三个廷臣骂哭，这让我觉得有一丝尴尬。我真的是一个残忍的喜欢伤害他人的[Root.GetManWoman]吗？

original: Who am I kidding? I love this!
translation: 我在戏弄谁？我就是喜欢这样！

original: Oh [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName], what have I done? Forgive me, please!
translation: 哦，[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]，我都做了些什么？请原谅我吧！

original: Men have never interested me, and my awkward attempts to find out if another woman feels like I do has always ended with insulted or apprehensive looks. But today, a woman tried to seduce me!
translation: 我对男人毫无兴趣，每当我试图弄明白其他女人是否喜欢像我这样的时候，总会受到她们侮辱性和忧虑的注视。但是今天一个女人试图诱惑我！

original: ...and she's irresistible!
As tempting as it is, I really shouldn't
translation: 虽然很诱人，但我仍然难以接受。

original: I realized when I was rather young that I would never find a woman attractive. The comfort and love I saw couples share felt out of my reach, until I met a man who felt as I did...
translation: 我突然发现我年轻的时候觉得任何女人都没有吸引力。直到我遇到一个和我有一样感觉的男人，伴侣之间的温存与爱情触动了我……

original: ...and he's irresistible!
I cannot give in to these feelings!
translation: 我不能屈服于这些感情！

original: Damn these peasants!

The people in [From.GetName] will no longer let themselves be ruled by someone of another religion! The peasant rebels controlling the county have defected and sworn allegiance to [From.County.Holder.GetTitledName]!
translation: [From.GetName]的人民再也不会让自己处于异教徒统治者的统治下！农民叛乱控制了本省，并叛逃向[From.County.Holder.GetTitledName]宣誓效忠！

original: Feeling estranged due to cultural differences in [FromFrom.Holder.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetName], the peasant rebels of [FromFrom.GetName] have defected and sworn allegiance to [From.County.Holder.GetTitledName]!
translation: [FromFrom.Holder.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetName]的人民由于文化不同而感到了疏远，[FromFrom.GetName]的农民已经变节了并且效忠于[From.County.Holder.GetTitledName]！

original: The people in [Root.GetName] will no longer let themselves be ruled by someone of another religion! The peasant rebels controlling the county have defected and sworn allegiance to another ruler!
translation: [Root.GetName]的人民再也不会让自己处于异教徒统治者的统治下！农民叛乱控制了本省，并叛逃向另一位统治者宣誓效忠！

original: Feeling estranged due to cultural differences in [Root.Holder.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetName], the peasant rebels of [Root.GetName] have defected and sworn allegiance to another ruler!
translation: [Root.Holder.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetName]的人民由于文化不同而感到了疏远，[Root.GetName]的农民叛军已经变节了并且宣誓效忠于另一个统治者！

original: Tired of their old ruler, the peasant rebels of [Root.GetName] have defected and sworn allegiance to me!
translation: 由于厌倦了他们的前领主，[Root.GetName]的农民叛军已经变节并且已经决定向我效忠！

original: Excellent! Or is it...?
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstName] is turning into an arrogant little braggart. I might have to rein [From.GetHerHim] in a bit.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetTitledFirstName]逐渐变成了一个自大的吹牛鬼。我必须约束一下[From.GetHerHim]了。

original: No, [From.GetSheHe] has reason to be proud
That will be cured by the birch.
Tell [From.GetHerHim], 'Pride goeth before fall'
Beat some respect into [From.GetHerHim]!
Talk to [From.GetHerHim] about kindness

It was a rather trivial matter that I wanted [From.GetTitledFirstName] to solve, an argument between a lowly farmer and myself. The farmer claimed I should pay for the damage caused to his house by my cow.
translation: 这是一件相当琐碎的事情，我希望[From.GetTitledFirstName]解决我和一个卑贱的农民之间的纠纷。那个农民主张我应该赔偿他那间被我的奶牛弄坏的房子。

I no longer find it hard or awkward to talk to people. I have lost the §YShy§! trait.
translation: 我发现和别人交谈再也不会尴尬了，我失去了§Y害羞§!特质。

original: I no longer fear the world, I embrace it and feel safe. I have lost the §YCraven§! trait.
translation: 我再也不畏惧这个世界了，我拥抱她，我现在感到了安全。我失去了§Y怯懦§!特质。

original: A ward of mine complained and called my court inferior, at least in comparison to the child's father's court.
translation: 我的一个被监护人抱怨我的宫廷是个渣渣，至少比起这家伙父亲的宫廷来说。

original: Try to improve your court to impress the child
translation: 尝试改善宫廷情况以取悦这个孩子

original: For a simple [Root.GetTitle], my court is nothing to be ashamed of!
translation: 对于[Root.GetTitle]来说，我的宫廷没什么值得羞耻的！

original: Have the child sweep the stables
Birch the child
To be a ward in [Root.Guardian.GetTitledFirstName]'s court is improving my stature. I had no idea how different a [Root.Father.GetTitle]'s court and a [Root.Guardian.GetTitle]'s court could be!
translation: 在[Root.Guardian.GetTitledFirstName]的宫廷受教育使我成长了。我不知道怎么描述[Root.Father.GetTitle]与[Root.Guardian.GetTitle]的宫廷间有多大的差距！

original: What else can I learn?
s child [Root.GetFirstName] is thriving under [Root.Guardian.GetTitledFirstName]'s care
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] told me how much [From.GetSheHe] enjoyed being in the court of [From.Guardian.GetTitledFirstName] and how [From.GetHerHis] stature had improved!
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]告诉我[From.GetSheHe]有多高兴能呆在[From.Guardian.GetTitledFirstName]的宫廷，[From.GetHerHis]成长有多快！

original: I'm proud of you, [From.GetFirstName]!

My child was lured into stealing cookies and smearing jam all over the kitchen by one of my wards! The cook gave them a hearty scolding and then sent them to me, both still smeared with jam and covered in cookie crumbs.
translation: 受到一个被监护人的引诱，我的孩子偷了饼干，还把果酱涂满了整个厨房！厨子狠狠地责骂了他们，然后把全身沾满了果酱和饼干渣的他们送到我面前。

original: Punish the fosterling, forgive my child
translation: 惩罚养子，宽恕我的孩子

original: You will both clean the stables for a whole week!
I forgive you, but promise me this won't happen again!
translation: 我宽恕你们，但是要向我保证永不再犯！

original: Punish my own child for being so impressionable!
translation: 惩罚我那轻易受影响的孩子！

original: I have seen the looks on my wife [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]'s face every time she looks at my ward. The longing on her face tells me she wants to have children of her own, and I'll gladly help her with that.
translation: 我看得到我的妻子[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]每次看我的被监护人时的脸色。她渴望的表情告诉我她有多想要自己的孩子，我很乐意帮助她实现愿望。

original: Shall we try some more?
Why should I care?
You will grow strong from that

A foreign court can teach a child all kinds of important lessons, everything from respecting to understanding and even adapting to other people's traditions and culture. My ward has learnt several important lessons of life in my court, as foreign as it may be from its father's court.
translation: 一个外国宫廷可以教会孩子许多很重要的课程，从尊敬到理解，以及接受其他人的习俗和文化。我的被监护人在远离其父的我的宫廷里学到了很多重要的人生经验。

original: Its father will be pleased
translation: 亲生父亲肯定会很高兴的

original: s child is thriving under [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s care
translation: 的孩子在[Root.GetTitledFirstName]教导下茁壮成长

original: I knew I had made a good decision when I sent my child to [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s court. The life lessons learnt from a foreign court is worth its weight in gold and my child have learnt to respect and understand other people's traditions and culture.
translation: 我知道我把孩子送到[From.GetTitledFirstName]的宫廷是正确的。一个外国宫廷可以教会孩子许多很重要的课程，从尊敬到理解，以及接受其他人的习俗和文化。

original: Good, good

No matter how many questions I ask, [Root.Guardian.GetTitledFirstName] always has an answer and is ever so patient with me! Our relationship has grown and I feel as if I have formed a strong mentor-relationship with [Root.Guardian.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 不管我问多少问题，[Root.Guardian.GetTitledFirstName]总是耐心地逐一回答我！我们的关系越来越好，我感觉我和[Root.Guardian.GetTitledFirstName]已经建立起了牢固的师生情谊。

original: This will be good to me
has formed a strong relationship with [This.GetHerHis] ward [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 与[This.GetHerHis]被监护人[Root.GetTitledFirstName]建立起了牢固的友谊

original: I can handle things on my own
translation: 我可以自己处理好事情

original: My ward [From.GetFirstName] is inquisitive and asks so many questions it is hard to answer them all. I try my best and for every answer I give, [From.GetFirstName] seems to like me even more.
translation: 我的被监护人[From.GetFirstName]天生好奇，问了我许多难于回答的问题。我努力满足其疑惑，而我每给出一个答案，[From.GetFirstName]就似乎越喜欢我。

original: I think we have become friends!
translation: 我认为我们可以成为朋友！

original: My liege [From.GetTitledFirstName] seems to have lost interest in this noble and wants me to forget the whole thing.
translation: 我的领主[From.GetTitledFirstName]似乎对这个贵族失去了兴趣，并希望我把这些全都忘了。

original: As [From.GetSheHe] wish.
I watched my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] at play with another child yesterday and noticed that [From.GetSheHe] didn't want to share [From.GetHerHis] toys.
translation: 我昨天看见我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]与其他孩子一起玩，并注意到[From.GetSheHe]不愿意分享[From.GetHerHis]玩具。

original: This is how children learn thrift!
translation: 这就是孩子学习节俭的方法！

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] needs the birch!
[From.GetSheHeCap] needs a lecture on charity!
Hatred
I knew there was a huge bear somewhere near the caves in [Root.Location.GetName] and a courtier of mine had insisted to come along when my men and I went hunting for the bear.
translation: 当我和我的人在猎熊时，我得知在[Root.Location.GetName]附近的洞穴里有一只巨熊。我的一个廷臣坚持要跟我们一起去。

original: It seems [From.GetTitledName] does not care if I spread the rumor or not. I think [From.GetSheHe] will regret [From.GetHerHis] choice.
translation: 看起来[From.GetTitledName]对我是否传播谣言并不关心。我认为[From.GetSheHe]会后悔[From.GetHerHis]选择。

original: My liege seems to have lost interest in this noble and wants me to forget the whole thing.
translation: 我的领主似乎对这个贵族失去了兴趣，并希望我把这些全都忘了。

It hasn't escaped me that a vassal of mine does not like nor support me. My decisions are scoffed at, my suggestions ignored and the vassal takes any chance to show how little I matter.
translation: 一位封臣总是不喜欢甚至不支持我。我的决定被嘲笑，我的建议被无视，封臣利用每一个机会展示我的无足轻重。

original: I'll charm the vassal with my brilliant wits!
translation: 我要用我的聪明才智收服他！

original: is approached by [Root.GetTitledFirstName] in an effort from [Root.GetHerHim] to settle their differences

original: Too bad for the vassal I'm the one who rules here!
